111.content:
It was midnight as a armered truck pulled into deadman wonderland in side the two gaurds had try to interrogate the criminal they had but he remained silent the truck came to a stop one gaurd opened the door escorting the man out only to stop infront of a women.

"Warden Makina this is the new criminal." said the gaurd pointing to the man just standing their.

"I can see that." she sniped at the gaurd he took a back step to that the prisoner step forward."so your the warden of deadman wonderland?" said the man the two gaurds from the armered car shocked to hear his voice for the first time.
"yes I am do you have a problem with that." makina said grabbing the handle of her sword.

"No you remind me of some one that is all." the prisoner said holding his ground makina removed her hand and look at the prisoner. "You don't seem familiar but get going to your cell you have work tomorrow." order makina the prisoner walked in to the building but said as he walked "my name if you want to know is Marcus R Shane." he walked into a room where he was prosesed into the prisons systems his shackles removed and given his prison number. You are number 2749003 here is you cell." said the women who had escorted him the cell was small with only two bunks he was going to have to hope his roommate was smart enough to leave him alone.

Marcus layed on his bunk and fell asleep hoping he'd live to see tomorrow.

(I know it's short but I'm setting thing up at a bit of a slow pase)
111.title: Welcome to prison.

You stand in with a row of other prisoners all of which just look afraid you on the other hand stand still and calm as makina and her assistant stand before you.

"today is your first day working deadman wonderland those of you on death row better pay close attention the collars around your necks serve two purposes one to keep track and locate you the second it pumps a poison into your body that will kill you in three days." you want to sigh at this your not death row so no poison for you. "you will have to earn cash points to buy the antidote which will allow you to live for three more days understood." the prisoner nod. "any questions?" she asks you raise you hand. "are we assigned jobs or do we pick them?" you ask

The other prisoners just look at you like your crazy but just stand wanting an answer makina looks at you. "your assigned jobs unless picked for a event like a race." you stand their waiting for your job the other are dismissed while you wait makina then tells you. "you are to deliver supplies to the infermary they'll be at the loading dock elivator." she state walking off her assistant tells you where to go you see a push cart with boxes stacked ontop of it you push the cart up to the infermary when you notice makina walking out you push the crates into the room and leave the crates the nurse their says she's can handle this and tells you to get the other crap you run down to the elevator again only to see a guy trying to rip it open he's talking to himself though. "come on this has to be it I need that god damned--" "Hey stop that." you shout at him he turns to show that he's wearing a death sentence collar must be the antidote in the box he charges at you only for you to move out of the way and trip him he falls face first into the ground your about to stand up when he screams out two other guys come up and grab you and push against the wall. "sorry man but we need these a lot more then you." the guy try's to open the crate again you start to feel pain in your hand think they might be damaged you look down to see them glowing you point them up and two spear stab the two men holding you they fall back while letting you go the third guy sees this and runs off. "what just happen?" you asked the spears vanish and you see a cut on both you palms.

Later on the guy reported what he saw to makina leaving out the drug of course but apon seeing you she notice your bleeding bad and that the man who ratted you out just dropped dead. "your lucky it apears your the only wittiness to this I want to hear your story after your checked out you are sent back to the infermary and wait this got weird fast what the hell happen you couldn't do that before your getting a massive headache so you relax only to fall asleep.

111111.title: Talk to him

choices: Do as he says and go back to your cell
1111111.content:
Meet the cast and crew of G-block

“So…” Marcus begins “where do we sit?”

“Hmm…” Alex scans the room only to spot a familiar black haired boy and immediately begins to walk over.

“Hey Alex wait up” Marcus calls, chasing after Alex. Soon Marcus manages to catch up with Alex only to find him sitting besides three people; one was that of a boy with somewhat spiky hair, another was a man with spiky black hair and an eye patch! And lastly there was an, albino girl.

“Hey come on have a seat. They won’t bite.” Alex explains.

“Well Crow here might” Alex quickly retorts in a happy-go-lucky tone.

“Hey” the man name Crow growls.

“Relax, I was only kidding” Alex replies though no longer in a happy-go-lucky tone.

“Yeah Crowie no need to get all crazy. That’s my stick” Alex once more retorts and once more he says it in a happy-go-lucky yet this time sarcastic voice.

“Heh Alex you’re so funny” laughed the albino girl who was sitting beside the black haired boy.

“Hey Shiro don’t be so loud” the boy warned trying to calm her down.

“Oh come on Ganta, laugh a little” the albino girl named Shiro laughed.

“Yeah Ganta” Alex began before suddenly getting on top of the table “Laughter makes the world go around! Even if we’re in some strange hell hole we got to have fun!”
“Heh here here” Shiro cheers raising her pudding cup up in the air and jumping onto the table with Alex.

“Hey man, get down, you don’t want the guards to come do you” Marcus warns.

“Oh come on we might die anytime so you may as well have some fun before we die. Am I right deathrow?” Alex shouts raising a toast to the room.

“YAY!” The entire cafeteria cheered in response..

“A round of beer and cotton candy for all! Hahahaha” Alex laughed and once more everyone cheer, even Crow!

A few minutes passed as the somewhat part, oh what the hell, it was a full blown one. Beer was being handed out; tons of sweats which made Alex and Shiro go nuts. Heck even Ganta was having a good time.

“Heh nice party Alex” cheered one of the inmates.

“Yeah thanks for the free beer” cheered another.

“No problem, now if only we could get some music in here. Anybody know how to play the bass?“Alex asked.

Suddenly Alex was sent flying backwards, and ended up slamming right into the cafeteria wall.

“Somebody call for a bass?” called a cocky sounding voice.

“Damn, it’s an undertaker” one of the former partiers groaned.

“Alex you okay?” Marcus asked, concerned for his friend. Alex groaned, his chest killing him but otherwise alright.

"Y-yeah, cheap shot” Alex groaned in an angered tone of voice.

“This ain’t no place for a party, especially not for saps like you” laughed a man garbed like Japanese monk. In his hand was that of a guitar, the end of it smoking. “Now you want to continue what you were doing just now or get back to your cells? Your choice”

“What should we do?” Marcus thought.
1111111.title: Every party needs a crasher...

11111111.content:
“Yo Marcus” Alex begins.

“Huh? Alex, you say something?” Marcus asked, snapping out of his train of thought. Alex leaned in closer and began to whisper into Marcus’ ear.

“You go high, I’ll go low” Alex explained before suddenly bolting forward.

“Wait what” Marcus gasped in shock as his friend rushed forward at the undertaker only to receive another shot, this time to the face!

“GAH! My face” Alex screamed in pain, rolling around as if it would help ease the pain somehow.

“You see, that’s what you get for resisting pal” the undertaker explained planting a firm booted foot on Alex’s chest only for Alex to suddenly grab his leg.

“Got’cha!” Alex exclaimed with a laugh before turning his head toward the rest of the cafeteria. “Somebody wanna toss me a sharp object?” crow deside to help by throwing a knife alexs way. "thanks crow."

“You’re welcome” replied crow. Alex quickly jumped out from under the undertaker, took the knife in hand, ran his left hand across the span of the blade, and ate a peanut butter sandwich all in one go.

“So how’s about we play a game that I like to call Saw!”

“I’ll be Jigsaw and you be one of those people he kills! Oh and Marcus you can be that weird black haired chick from Saw 3.” Alex explains as a very sadistic and malice smile.

“Umm…” Marcus was unsure.
11111111.title: Let the games and crazy nonsense, begin!

12.title: Today is the day they imprisoned a man named Alex

choices: On the way to the infermary...
On the way to the infermary (alternative route)...
121.content:
It was early morning that hot summer day as a armored car drove down the highway towards a large and very strange amusement park. Inside the armored car lied three people, two guards and a prisoner.

“Name?” says the guard on the passenger side of the car.

“Alex” the prisoner replies not looking up from where he sat in the armored car. The prisoner had dark blond hair though there wasn’t much of a source of light coming into the armored car so not even the guards could make out anything more than his head. Thank god he was chained up.

“He means your full name…” the guard who was driving the armored car explained.

“Alexander Necro” the prisoner replied smiling a somewhat cocky smile.

“Necro? That can’t be your real last name! Tell me what it really is” the now irritated guard on the passenger’s side of the demanded!

“Now now, no need to get all bet out of shape. After all I’m going to prison. It’s not like I’m going to really need a last name. After all I’m only a criminal” the prisoner groaned a bit annoyed by the guard’s tone of voice.

“Whatever, just shut up” the annoyed guard yelled as he turned back to face the front windshield of the armored car.

A half hour passes before the armored car finally arrives at its destination, Deadman Wonderland, a theme park with many sights and attractions, some of which are never even seen by the public eye. However soon, yes very soon, would the prisoner in the armored car meet these ‘secret’ attractions those along with many of Deadman inner secrets including the deadmen within!

“Oh look we’re here” the prisoner said spontaneously out of nowhere after having been quiet for the last several minutes.
“Whoa? What? How do you know that?” the driver guard asked a bit shock to hear the prisoner’s sudden outburst? The prisoner simply smiled and sniffed the air.

“I can smell the cotton candy. I hope I can get some later” the prisoner exclaimed in a moment of bliss. He did enjoy his sweets, even before that who incident of the burning high school. ‘Ah so many good sweats, burned to nothing but ash. How tragic’ the prisoner thought, shrugging.

“Heh you’re not getting any where you’re going” the guard on the passenger side of the car gloated wickedly as the car came to an immediate and sudden stop causing the prisoner inside to slam headfirst into the metal floor of the armored car’s right sight (he was on the left side and the stop sent him forward into the opposite wall)

“Ow” the prisoner groaned, rubbing his head as a small trace of blood began to seep out of a newly formed cut on the top of his head.

“Sorry my foot slipped” the driver apologized sincerely.

“I’m okay. Oh and where am I going exactly, if you don’t mind me asking Mr. Secret-keeping-guard-of-secrets?” the prisoner asked in an antagonizing yet devious tone.

“W-what? S-shut up! Stop putting words in my mouth” the passenger guard quickly snapped back as he walked to the back of the truck and began to open the door.

“Oh sorry, maybe there’s something in the air. I guess that or maybe it’s these shackles which are a bit tight on the ankles by the way. Honestly did you people really have to bind my legs? I mean where do I have to go exactly?”

“Just shut the hell up and get out of there!” the now very annoyed guard barked as the bright sunlight of the afternoon sun pierced the inside of the truck like a hail of bullets. The prisoner tried to stand and came very close to walking and hoping out of the armored car when suddenly.

“Whoops” suddenly the guard stuck his foot out, causing the prisoner to trip and tumble out of the armored car.

“Ow, what was that for” the prisoner wined rubbing his head once more, the cut on his head opening even further.

“I hope it did you damn annoying son of a bitch!” the guard growled vengefully as he began to stomp on the wounded prisoner before him.

Several painful and bloody minutes pass as the guard continues his curve stomp of a beat down on the prisoner before suddenly stopping at the sound of a female voice.

“That’s enough Takada” a female voice called from behind the guard. Immediately the torturer of the prisoner stopped his assault. The guard quickly saluted and a woman stepped forward, followed behind her was another women though she was smaller.

“Warden Makina” the guard gasped in shock.

“What were you doing to that prisoner just now” asked the smaller women besides Makina whose name was a mystery right now.

“Um…well… you see I was…it’s this prisoner’s fault! He attacked me” the guard gasped in a hurry. It almost seemed like he was falling to pieces at the mere sight of this Warden Makina.

“T-that’s a lie” the prisoner coughed, some of it normal saliva while the other parts was blood.

“Get this prisoner to Doctor Takashima” Warden Makina explained walking forward towards the guard named Takada “I’ll see you in my office later Takada.” The guard gulped hard, he knew he was in for it and god help him that he’d be alive tomorrow. The guard took one last look at the prisoner and growled a warning.

“Next time I see you, you’re not gonna have her to save you” the guard growled as the women beside Makina walked past the Takada and helped the prisoner up.

“Don’t worry we’ll have you to the infirmary soon” her voice sounded sincere and the prisoner nodded.

“Thank you” the prisoner said as he stood up with help from the woman beside him.

“It was because I wanted to help you, it was because I didn’t want to see one of my guards break a rule” Makina quickly replied.

“Okay but still thanks” the prison said bowing before finally leaving for the infirmary.

“Now Takada…” Makina began.

‘*Gulp* I’m gonna die’ Takada’s last thoughts before the prisoner vanished from view.
121.title: A Car Ride, a Head Injury, and a Very Angry Guard

choices: After the next Carnival Corpse and in the cafateria of G-block...
1212.content:
As the prisoner named Alex and the unknown women walked down the halls, Alex spots someone and decides to say hello.

“Oh um hi there” a boy with black hair, a former middle school student by the look of it, said in response to the prisoner’s wave of hello.

“It’s nice to see another friendly face. Quick! Give me a hug before somebody sees” the prison explains strangely.

“W-what?” the boy’s response was the same as the women besides the prisoner.

“Heh. Kid. Ding” the prisoner explained wagging his finger in front of the boy’s face.

“Uh okay…” the boy was about to leave but the prisoner stopped him.

“Hey now before you go I recommend you take this seeing as how you had to put up with me.” The prison quickly reaches into his bag, having already grabbed the standard prison uniform, which was basically khaki green overalls, and a bag consisting of what you’d expect, some water, a little food, some bandages, ext… “Now reach out your hand, come on don’t be shy.”

The boy was smart enough to play along and hesitantly stuck out his hand. The prisoner quickly fished through his pocket and then held out his fist before carefully placing something in the boy’s hand.

“Now don’t open your hand until you get back to your cell, okay” the prisoner explain.

The boy quickly nods and took his leave.

‘What a strange guy’ the boy thought and after walking out of eye sight he decided to take a peak at what the strange man had placed in his hand.

“What the hell?!” the boy exclaimed in shock causing every prisoner and guard around him to look in his direction. “Oh I umm stepped on a bug” immediately everyone turned back to what they were doing and the boy quickly hurried back to his cell. ‘Why did that guy give his piece of candy? Doesn’t he know he needs it’ the boy made his way back to his cell.

…

Back with the prisoner and the woman, they had just arrived at the infirmary.

“Doctor Takashima I was sent by warden Makina to bring this prisoner here.” The women explained.

“Alright, you can leave now” a woman with short light-brown hair who was garbed in a white lab coat that covered part of her violet colored dress, explained.

“Yes ma’am” the women explained. The prisoner waved goodbye to the women and in a somewhat strange twist the women waved back.

“Bye bye Kasuga, treat yourself to some cotton candy later, I’m sure you deserve it” the prisoner explained before the women named Kasuga finally took her leave.

“Here take a seat” Doctor Takashima explained as she sat down in her comfortable black colored leather chair. The prisoner quickly looked around and soon took a seat on a small metal stool in front of the doctor. “Now tell me, what did you do to get sent down here?”

“Well there’s a cut on my head I think you should look at…” the prisoner began, slowly moving his hand to show the doctor the cut he got from the armored car. Doctor Takashima quickly slipped on a pair of rubber gloves and the began to examine the prisoner’s head.

“Hmm…well I don’t see anything serious, just some bleeding but-“

“Ow” the prisoner groans as Doctor Takashima sticks her finger into the prisoner’s now reopened wound.

“Oh god so much blood, I love it” she quips sounding insane.

“Stop” the prisoner pleads but the doctor continues to prod her finger even deeper.

“Ooh I think I can see part of your sku-“

“I said STOP” immediately Doctor Takashima stopped in place, her finger gently removing itself from the prisoner’s head almost as if it had a mind of its own!

“W-what the hell” Doctor Takashima gasped in shock “why can’t I move? What did you do to me?”

“I said stop and you stopped, plain and simple! Now if you would kindly back several steps away” just as the prisoner spoke those words Doctor Takashima backed a few feet away.

“Damn it I-I can’t control my b-body” she stuttered trying to resist with every fiber of her being.

“I’m not going to kill you, far from it. I’m not some sick whack job that get’s off on causing pain. No I’m more of a candy man, which speaking of candy, I believe you have at least three pieces in your coat pocket. Confiscated them from some poor prisoners perhaps?” the prisoner explained standing up.

“D-damn you” Doc Takashima groaned as she uncontrollably reached her hand into her pocket and pulled out three pieces of candy that were wrapped in a very similar wrapper as the one the prisoner had given the boy from earlier.

“Hand them over…” the prisoner explained and like the puppet she now was, Doctor Takashima did so, showing as much resistance as she could, which wasn’t much due to the prisoner having complete control of her muscles at this point.

“H-here” the words came out stuttered and almost a shout, luckily no one was around to hear her, as she dropped the three pieces of candy into the prisoner’s hand.

“There now was that really so hard? You know what? I think I’ll give you a little treat seeing as you’ve been such a good puppet.”

“I’ll kill you-“

“Hush, here I’m sure you want one of these. Here have one. I’ll even unwrap it for you” the prisoner explained unwrapping one of the three pieces of candy in his hand. Now these candies were used to nullify the poison that were in the collars that death row inmates wore, even the prisoner wore one which didn’t bother him that much, but…what would happen if you fed one of these candies to someone who wasn’t poisoned? He held out the piece of candy, it was a horrible dark color, maybe because it was so bitter, maybe not? Oh well. “Now open your mouth…” the prisoner asked holding up the piece of candy to the doctor’s mouth.

“I-I’ll A-AH” the doctor was cut off as the prisoner pushed the small piece of candy into her mouth. Instantly the taste hit the doctor, so bitter and disgust, however even though she swallowed it whole it left a disgusting after taste.

“There now for mine…wait you know what I’ll save it for late. Thanks doc it’s been fun” the prisoner said waving goodbye as he walked out of the room, a happy-go-lucky smile on his face.

Several minutes pasted before suddenly Doctor Takashima was released. At first she gasped for breath, trying to sort through a mix of pure hatred and admiration. However soon she arrived at the conclusion that she needed to report this, but not to the warden, it was someone else entirely she needed to contact!

She quickly reached for the phone, punched in a number and after several rings, a young man on the other line spoke.

“Hello” said the young man on the other side of the line “What is it?”

“It’s me” Doctor Takashima explained.

“Yes what do you want? I am in the middle of a Carnival Corpse at the moment can’t this wait?” the young man sounded a bit irritated, or was that annoyed? The women couldn’t tell nor did she care.

“We have another one, a deadman” suddenly the man on the other end of the line fell dead silent.

“Hmm is that so…? Well that’s just fantastic we’ll have him moved into G-block immediately and his first match’ll be tomorrow! Yay this is going to be so much fun, Carnival Corpse, two days in a row! The fans will love it!” the young man exclaimed in a bit of childish whimsy.

“Yes, right away” Doctor Takashima explained, nodding her head before hanging up. She stood there for a moment, just letting everything sink in before she smiled wickedly at the thought of getting to cut open that foolish deadman who crossed her. Oh how…naughty.

Okay what next?
(Ps: That last tid bit is a reference; if you get it uh…here have an invisible cookie)
1212.title: Meeting Ganta Igarashi…

12122.content:
“Now ladies and gentlemen as a special treat, today we will have another Carnival Corpse!” cheered the announcer as if loving every word he spoke. Slowly one cage containing a young man with dirty blond hair was lowered onto the battle area floor.

“Now this young man is the whole reason why we’re all here today folks! The manipulative man that burned down and entire highschool, kids and faculty included! The one, the only, Sparrow!” several gasps were heard as the young man climbed out of his container.

“Him? He doesn’t look like much” one voice exclaimed in disbelief.

“Oh come now Dog, give the guy a chance. He had to have a good reason” explained another voice.

“Yeah he’s nuts!” chirped another voice.

“HEY!” suddenly all fell quiet as the young man with dirty blond hair spoke up. “Let’s just get this thing overwith, I don’t really enjoy fighting.”

“Don’t enjoy it?” one shocked voice gasped.

“Now I wasn’t expecting that” another voice explained.

“He’s got to be joking! How else could this ‘pacifist’ have managed to burn down an entire high school?” another voice, this one a bit of a loud mouthed one, screamed annoyed.

“Now now ladies and gentlemen, calm down. We haven’t even started yet” the announcer explained, trying to regain control of the situation.

“…” everyone quickly settled back down and the announcer continued.

“Now onto our next competitor, he’s the deadman with those savage claws, the one, the only, Falcon!” suddenly another cage, similar in appearance to the one that the young man had been in before, was quickly lowered onto the battle area floor. Inside it was that of a small child, well at first glance it looked like a small child. In actuality it was that of a small man, no taller than 3ft but clearly showed signed of aging.

“Is it time for me to fight again?” the small man asked? He had jet black hair that ran down to his shoulders. He was wearing a normal prisoner’s outfit though it seemed to be a bit big on him as the sleeves clearly were longer than his arms. The man hesitantly climbed out of his cage, only to stumble and fall on his face.

‘Poor guy’ the young man with the dirty blond hair thought as he watched the small get back up. ‘Maybe I can forfeit or something, save him-‘the young man’s thoughts were cut short as a sheering pain shot up in his shoulder. The young man quickly glanced to his left to see a large gash running the length of his entire upper arm!

“What the h-“

“Falcon Claw!” shouted the voice of the small man and out of nowhere another gash appeared on the young man’s body, this time his lower back!

“Gah!” the young man gasped in pain, gripping his chest as soon another slash and another gash appeared on the young man’s body causing him to fall to the ground in pain.

“What kind of fight is this?” one of the on lookers spat.

“Yes this does seem a bit one sided” another explained, expressing his annoyance.

“Hey Tamaki I thought you said this would be a great fight! Not some one-sided slaughter house” growled the angry voiced onlooker from before.

“Hey now I think it’s about to get. Look!” another voice replied, presumably Tamaki’s voice. It was true something was about to happen and this fight was about to be rebalanced! In fact deep inside the man his blood was beginning to boil over, sick of getting hit, sick of people laughing at him, sick of hearing those stupid on looker’s voices!

“ENOUGH!” screamed the young man. The young man got to one knee but another slash appeared on his leg, slicing up his pant leg as well as part of his lower leg. The young man continued to try and stand, even though he was losing more and more blood. Soon a small puddle of blood began to form underneath the young man, his skin grew exceptionally pale, in fact the man showed signs of almost total blood loss!

“Falcon-“

“SHUT UP!” the young man shouted, quickly whirling around and, to the surprise of everyone, grabbed the small man’s arm, stopping his onslaught dead in its tracks!

“Wha-“the small man could barely speak a word before the young man before him suddenly flashed a sadistic smile.

“Payback!” The young man exclaimed in an almost satanic tone of voice as he quickly flashed his other hand forward, grabbing the man by the neck and lifting him into the air. The young man looked at his attacker turned victim; his sleeves had become ripped and slashed up only to reveal that of the small man’s hands. His fingers were covered in blood, forming several long sickle like blades that the small man had used to create all those gashes.

“So these are the claws you used on me? Heh a nice weapon but a bit fragile, especially if I do this *snap* ” the young man quickly raised his leg and then with a mighty axe kick he snapped the small man’s arm in half, utterly crushing the man’s bone inside the arm.

“GAH!” the small man screamed in agony before the young man quickly drove the small man’s face into the ground, silencing him immediately! However this wasn’t the end as the young man did it again and again, slamming the small man’s head into the ground until it was nothing but a bloody pool on the floor.

“And that’s it. The former punching bag-“

“SHUT UP!” the young man screamed throwing the body of the small man at the loud speaker above him. The loud speaker quickly fell to the ground with a loud slam, however it still remained together, though the insides would beg to differ. The young man slowly walked forward, towards the loud speaker and placed a bent leg on the broken loud speaker.

“Now listen up you bastards! I better not see any of you sob’s in person or I’ll…” suddenly the young man passed out, leaving the audience speechless.

“Well I guess that wraps that up. Thank you all for watching. Umm…tune in next time for the next Carnival Corpse!” the announcer’s voice rang out from a second hidden speaker. Satisfied everyone quickly left and the cleanup crew entered to take care of the mess left by the battle.

…

Later in the cell of the young man, the young man had finally awoken. In fact he had just awoke in time to see the replay of the fight, however before the video broadcast was over the young man switch the television off.

“Hey why’d you do that? It was getting to the good part” an annoyed yet happy-go-lucky voice whined.

“Yeah they were about to show the part where I smash that fucker’s face into the ground” another voice, this one a wicked and sinister voice, laughed.

“Hey now, don’t patronize him. After all he’s been through a lot. Just look at all those bandages. He’s lucky just to be alive” explained a caring and loving voice.

“Yeah whatever” groaned the wicked voice before finally shutting up.

“Aw, I guess I’ll just go play with Mama then" the happy-go-lucky voice from before explained before finally fading away.

“…” the young man let out a small breath of air before the caring voice from before spoke up.

“Are you okay sweetie?” ask the caring voice from before.

“Yes I’m alright” the young man answered aloud.

“Are you sure? That was a bit of a bad fight you were in” the kind hearted voice explained, expressing her concern.

“I’ll be fine. Thanks for your concern, Mom”
12122.title: A Carnival Corpse and a man of many personalities

121221.content:
It was a few days later before anything really relevant happened. Alex had spent most of his in his cell, only making a trip to the vending machine every once in awhile or to the bathroom for rather natural reasons. However today was different.

"Gah I can't take it! I need some action" growled an angered yet anxious voice.

"Calm down, I'm not scheduled for another Carnival corpse. Not one that I'm aware of at least" Alex explained saying the last part with a small sigh.

"Do they even tell you when you're going to be in one? Like some advanced notice" asked a curious voice.

"Hmm maybe but I doubt it" Alex explained as he turned the corner to see the vending machines which he was lookign for. "Oh look the vending machines. Alright guys what'll it be this time?"

"Something spice and hot" the angry voice demanded!

"How's about some sweats, wait do we have any more of that cotton candy from earlier" asked the curious voice?

"Now now we had sweets yesterday. How's about something else, maybe something smooth? I think you may be getting a sore throat, sweetie” ask a concern voice.

“Gah! Come on spice!” growled the angry voice.

“No, sweets! Sweets!” chirped the curious turned anxious voice.

“Come on, he needs something smooth and cool” explained the concerned voice.

“Spice!”

“Sweet”

“Smooth”

“SHUT UP ALL OF YOU” Alex shouted silencing the three voices.

“Um are you okay” asked a concerned voice, though this one was different from the other voice that Alex had been hearing. Alex turned around to see that of a girl, she was a little taller than 4ft but not nearly as tall as Alex.

“Oh…yeah I’m alright” Alex stuttered out like an idiot. He quickly turned around to try and hide his face; he was blushing, either due to being embarrassed that someone saw him talking to himself, or because of the girl.

‘Oh come on. She’s probably half your age’ Alex thought.

“Um…excuse me” the girl began “you’re blocking the vending machine.”

“Oh um sorry” Alex apologized as he backed away. The girl quickly approached the vending machine, inserting her card into vending machine.

“Whoa 10,000 cash points?!” Alex gasped out in shock.

“Yeah it’s a lot but not nearly as much as before when I won my first carnival corpse.” The girl explained flicking her long dark brown hair in the air in order to get it out of her line of sight.

“Wait you were in Carnival Corpse? But you’re so young?” Alex exclaimed a bit shock.

“Actually I’m fifteen” she explained as a cup of coffee popped out of the machine, smoking hot as if it had just been brewed.

“Drink too much coffee” Alex asked only to have the girl glare at him. “S-sorry it’s just my mom told me that if you drink too much coffee it’ll stunt you growth.”

“Hey just because I’m short now doesn’t mean I will later! I’m still in the middle of puberty. Who knows I might even be bigger than you when I turn eighteen” the girl growled annoyed by the annoying older boy before her.

“Look I’m sorry-“

“I don’t want to hear it Mama’s boy!” the now fully angered girl growled “You are just like my stupid father! And GAH!” the girl quickly walked off before she could say anymore, leaving Alex a bit dumbfounded.

“What a strange girl” began the caring voice that Alex had thought he had silence along with the rest of the other voices.

“Yeah, who does she think she is? The next time you see her-“

“-give her a piece of you candy” the happy-go-lucky chimed in interrupting the angered voice.

“Gah! Would you guys shut up and leave me alone for once in my life!” Alex growled annoyed and yet also angry that he really had no one else to talk to, well someone other than the voices inside his head. Yes he knew they weren’t real but they were the only things he could talk to. Alex had always had a habit of talking to himself but after that earthquake, yes after that earthquake with mom.

“Yes?”

“Not you! The real one, my mom! Not some stupid copy I thought up” Alex growled angrily at the voice!

“B-but-“

“Shut up! You’re not real! None of you are. You’re just a thought! And I can get rid of you just as easily!” Alex growled threatening the not only the caring voice but the entire trio!

“But I don’t want to die” the happy-go-lucky voice who now began to cry for once in its life.

“Hey its okay, he doesn’t mean it” the caring voice explained trying to sooth the other personality.

“No I do mean it! I want you all gone! I wish I never thought of you! I wish-“

“And then what? You’ll be alone” growled the angry yet now vengeful voice!

“Shut up! I hate you” Alex growled slamming his hands over his ears as if to block out the sound.

“That’s not going to work and you know it” the vengeful voice warned and in a strange way it only made his voice louder.

“Shut up!” Alex cried now feeling actual pain inside his head.

“Or what?” the voice mocked “If you lose us you’ll go insane like those other crazy fucks in here. Yeah good luck surviving without us” the voice yelled now screaming at the top of his lungs.

“Shut up” Alex screamed slamming his head against the vending machine causing the display glass to crack and shatter, this caused a large cut to appear on the young man’s forehead. On the floor laid several shattered pieces. Alex collapsed to his knees and looked down at the pieces of shatter glass, suddenly the images of three beings appeared on the pieces of shattered glass. One was that of a young woman, her hair dirty blond like Alex’s and eyes the color of green. The other two were a bit different, well one still human the other was far from it. The second being was that of a small child, somewhat like a child version of Alex only with regular bright blond colored hair. Now the last being, he was something completely different! If one word could describe the being then that word would be, red! This ‘Red’ being had horns and eyes of pure hatred! It had jet black hair and two bloody horns coming out of its forehead.

“How dare you, you insolent fool” growled the red skin being.

“Please stop, you’re hurting yourself” the image of the women pleaded.

“No don’t fight! Stop! Please!” the young child image cried.

“Shut up! Shut up! Shut up” Alex repeated clawing at his head as if trying to grasp some last bit of sanity he had left.

“Insolent fool” *smash* Alex slammed his fist into the image of the red being trying to shut him up, however this did quite the opposite as the red being only multiplied, his figure now fractured in the multiple pieces of glass!

“Come on stop it” pleaded the woman.

“Please big brother, stop it” cried another voice, this one of a small little girl.

“…” Alex couldn’t speak; his eyes began to sting as tears began to flood out of his eyes. Soon he could do nothing more then get into a fetal position and just let the tears come.
121221.title: Shattered mind...

1212212.content:
Elsewhere a boy named Ganta Igarashi and a girl with an albino skin tone and white hair walked down a somewhat random corridor of G-block.

“But Ganta can’t we just get some sweats from the vending machine?” the albino girl with white hair groaned.

“No Shiro, besides I think I’m all out of cash points” the boy named Ganta explained.

“Aw come on your being a meanie!” the girl named Shiro wined while flailing her arms around in a comedic fashion. Ganta didn’t know what to do as he tried to calm his companion down when suddenly “Hey Ganta” Shiro began stopping her comedic antics.

“Huh?” Ganta began. He had indeed heard something but it was faint, like some sort of soft crying. “Is that…crying?” Shiro imminently bolted forward only to stop a moment later and wave for Ganta to follow her. “Hey, Shiro, wait a minute” Ganta called only for Shiro to bolt for it causing Ganta to have to play catch up.

…

Indeed someone was crying but no one around had decided to ask the prisoner why he was crying. Actually no one had even bothered to acknowledge the prisoner and stayed about as far away from the crying prisoner as possible. Well that is until one pure white hair girl arrived on the scene, followed somewhat closely by her black and spiky haired companion.

“Hey Shiro wait up” cried the voice of the white haired girl’s companion as he finally managed to round the corner only to see that of the crying prisoner, crying right besides the vending machine.

“Ganta…” the white haired girl began; her voice was of an unusually saddened tone.

“Shiro…” the boy with the spiky black hair began.

“Shush…” the white haired girl warned, putting a gloved finger to her mouth, as she walked closer to the crying prisoner.

“But-“

“Shush, Ganta” the white haired girl named Shiro said, shushing her companion as she slowly moved closer to crying prisoner. The crying prisoner did not respond to her advancement, in fact he was too busy crying to even notice the two’s appearance. His mind was in shambles, a single memory had returned and with it brought great pain to the prisoner. “Hey…” Shiro began; her voice now of very a hushed and gentle tone of voice.

“…” the prisoner didn’t respond and just continued crying. However Shiro continued to try and coax some sort of answer out of the prisoner.

“Wait a minute I know this guy” the boy named Ganta began “He was the weird guy who gave me this piece of candy when I first saw him.” Ganta quickly pulled out a small piece of candy that he had saved since the day he received it!

“T-that voice…” the crying prisoner sniffled out, turning his head and finally acknowledging the two’s appearance.

“Umm…hey” Ganta gasped out, he was trying to sound friendly but not really. He had seen plenty of crazy people here and knowing said crazy people were unstable he didn’t want to get attacked which is why he tried to get Shiro to back away from him but she wouldn’t budge.

“You’re that kid I gave my candy to…” the prisoner began as he tried to sit up, his muscles were stiff from not moving and it showed with all the sounds of cracking bones that were moving back into place.

“Umm you can have it back, here” Ganta hesitantly reached out the hand that held the prisoner’s candy but the prisoner simply looked at him.

“You kept it?” the prisoner asked while trying to stand up only to fall right back down. “God why am I so weak? How long was I crying for?”

“I don’t know but I remember hearing about someone who had broken down by a vending machine about two days ago” Ganta explained.

“Two days?!” the prisoner gasped out in shock ‘Had it really been that long? I don’t remember it. All I remember was hearing my…’ it was then that the prisoner’s thought broke into verbal speech. “M-my sister, oh my god the earthquake, mom, sis, where are you?” the prisoner began to freak out just like some war vet having an episode!

“SNAP OUT OF IT” *SMACK!* the prisoner was sent flying into the vending machine.

“Shiro!” Ganta shouted, quickly rushing to the prisoner’s side and began to help remove him out of the broken vending machine.

Finally after removing the prisoner from the broken machine, Ganta realized just how much of a messed up state the prisoner was in. He was soaked in a mix of blood and bodily fluid; he had a large cut mark on his head that by now was surly infected.

“T-take me…”

“Huh? What did you say” Ganta asked leaning in closer to the prisoner than he normally would, then again this prisoner was far from normal.

“Take me…to my room” the prisoner groaned though barely loud enough to be heard, even with Ganta so close as he was.

“Wha? You’re room? But I don’t even know where-“

“Hey Ganta over here” called the voice of Shiro! Ganta instinctively whirled around to see that his female companion had found a room with its door wide open a few feet down the hall. Ganta nodded and turned back to the prisoner “Hold on I’ll get you to your room, just hold out till then, okay?” The prisoner gave a weak nod as Ganta tried to help him stand, only to realize that he was too heavy for him to lift alone. “Come on! You’ve got to help too” Ganta groaned and, as if on autopilot, the prisoner immediately bolted upward!

“Whoa” Ganta exclaimed in shock as the prisoner suddenly picked up Ganta and threw him onto his back! “Put me down! Hey, put me down damn it!” Ganta yelled but the prisoner didn’t respond, again it seemed like the prisoner was on autopilot, this was even more reinforced by the prisoner’s zoned out expression.

Suddenly the prisoner bolted forward and in a matter of milliseconds he came to a stop right in front of Shiro.

“Here, go in here” Shiro coaxed, directing the zombie man into the room. (Why a zombie man you may ask? Well because he is! Just look at those cuts and scrapes, he’ll look at all the blood…wait this isn’t a visual medium… crap >_<)

Regardless the zombie like man quickly entered the room, sat Ganta down in a nearby wooden chair, and then collapsed onto the bed, outcold!

I have dark black hair, used to be bright blond but I dyed it. A blond psychopath, please I’m much better than Jack the ripper. I killed my entire family for fucks sake.

What do I wear?

I wear a gas mask to hide my face, no one liked my face before, not the girls at my school, nor did that Bitch of a sister I had. Ooh I hope you like my face now cause you ain’t got one now. Besides my gas mask I wear a blood red t-shirt, and some ripped up blue jeans. Well they wouldn’t’ be ripped if that fucker Dick didn’t struggle so much. Hard to aim well while someone shoves eleven packs of cigarettes down your throat, huh?

What else do you wear? Any accessories or…

I wear a long coat that is a color so dark green that it looks almost black! Oh and I wear a locket, it holds a picture of me and my mother…before all ‘they’ entered the picture. My siblings and that bastard! GAH-

Anyway next question…umm any fears?

…
…….I’m afraid of the dark

Okay that’s it for the profile enjoy your stay

Thank you, I will
15521.title: Introducing Alex the Undertaker...

155211.content:
“Excuse me but is this the place where I can get a drink?” ask a tall man garbed in what seemed totally black long coat.

“Huh? You must be the new guy. The name’s Mitch” explained a man grabbed in a bar tender’s get up. The man named Mitch was standing behind that of a bar with many different assortments of items ranging from simple bags of chips to high class saki to cheap chocolates all around the counter and behind the counter. The tall man in the black long coat quickly took a seat and the man named Mitch spoke again. “So what’ll it be?”

“Alcohol, strongest you got” replied the man.

“So that’s your poison, eh? Well here you go a glass of Strong Armed Devil; if it doesn’t knock you on your ass then you’ll find yourself with a massive hang over. Either way it’s the strongest stuff we got, alcohol wise” Mitch explained setting down a tall glass of deep crimson liquid onto the counter before sliding it down the counter to the man.

“Thanks...” the man replies a bit annoyed.

“I know that tone. Something you wanna talk about it?” immediately the man in the long coat gave Mitch a death stare. “Sorry, didn’t mean to make you mad.” The long coat man simply looked back at his glass and took a large sip.

…

After several drinks the long coated man decided to remove his long coat, revealing several slash marks that had turned into scars. By the look of it, a kitchen knife had been used against the man, although very clumsily as none of the slashes looked very deep.

“My my, you must have been through a lot. I’ve only seen one other person with scars like that and I believe that was-“the former long coated man cut Mitch off.

“I don’t really care.” The man exclaimed in a groan of annoyance as he began to rub the two temples on above his eyes.

“Sorry…” Mitch apologized as he grabbed another bottle of Strong Arm only for the former long coated man to stop him.

“That’s enough Alcohol for now. I’d like something to eat, maybe something sweet.” The man explained sliding his glass two inches from where it originally sat.

“Coming right up, do you want anything special?” Mitch asked to which the man gave a small shrug along with a joking smirk.

“Surprise me” the man said in a sincere almost sarcastic tone.

“Got’cha, one sweat surprise coming up” Mitch explained turning around and crouching down to face a hidden mini-fridge.

…

A few minutes later Mitch stands back up and in his hand was that of a cherry topped vanilla sundae.

“Whelp here you go, bon appétit” Mitch explains, placing the sundae in front of the man and then hands him a spoon.

“Heh you don’t disappoint.” The man exclaimed with a small chuckle as he took the spoon in hand only to be stopped moments before he could dig into his sundae.

“Before you eat, answer me this. What’s your name?” Mitch asked politely?

“Grr…fine” the man groaned reluctant to talk about himself. “My name is Alex.”

“Alexander?” Mitch asked.

“Call me Alex!” the man growled as if he were a vicious animal.

“Okay, Alex. Enjoy your sundae” Mitch explained, taking Alex’s empty glass in hand, and he walked off.

…

About an hour later the man named Alex had already finished his sundae and was about to dig into another when someone new entered the bar.

“Yo! It’s me and the boys! Get us some drinks bartender “called a very loud voice as three large and very strongly built men entered the bar. Two of the men were just normal prisoners; the only difference was a different skin tone. However the other man even more built than other two, and he seemed the type to be more muscle than brawn. However the man named Alex didn’t acknowledge their approach as the three man took a seat at the bar, the largest and bulkiest man sitting directly beside Alex.

“Yo what the fuck is that shit? Yo bartender who the hell told you to serve this shit” the man screamed, intentionally screaming in the man named Alex’s face. Alex simply ignored the annoying man and continued to eat his sundae only for the annoying man to knock the spoonful of ice cream out of his hand. “Yo nigga I’m talkin to ya!”The man screamed as if he was the blackest gangster from the boondocks where in actuality the man was quiet white.

“…” Alex didn’t reply and simply stood up to retrieve his spoon which had fallen to the floor.

“Damn it fucker don’t ignore me!” screamed the man before he suddenly grabbed Alex by the head and slammed him into the counter. “Now look at me! Look me in the eye nigga!” The man turned Alex’s head so that he could face him only to see Alex with a look that terrified the man “You son of a bitch! Don’t look at me like that!” the man screamed before throw a huge punch only for Alex to catch him mid-punch.

“…” Alex stood up, his hand gripping the man’s arm like a vice, as he stared the man.

“GAH! Let me go nigga! Let go” the man screamed only for Alex to increase his grip.

*snap*

“AHHHH” the man screamed as the joint in his arm where his arm met his hand snapped way out of place.

“Nigger? Is that what you called me?” Alex finally spoke, his tone so threatening that it made the other two men at the counter besides the bar tender, run away in fear.

“Get back here you god damn f-“

*SLAM!*

“Look at me! Do I even look even the slightest bit tan or dark skinned?” Alex growled his voice growing even angrier as he pulled the man’s face back up from the counter.

“What you talkin bout-“

“SHUT UP!” Alex screamed slamming the man’s face once more into the table.

*slam!* *SLAM!* *SLAM!*

“Answer the question you piece of white trash!” Alex demanded, placing a death grip on the man’s throat.

“N-no nig…uh I mean man.” The man screamed and suddenly was released, falling on his backside. “*cough, cough* you *cough* crazy son of a *cough* bitch” the man coughed trying to regain his balance as Alex walk back towards where he put his long coat.

*Vroom, vroom* the sound of a chainsaw entered the man’s ears and he immediately pissed his pants in response. Alex quickly turned around; in his hand were what appeared to be two overly wide swords.

“Let me ask you a question White Trash…” Alex began walking forward, swords in hand.

“Stay away from me man!” the man pleaded. “Help me!” he pleaded to the bartender.

*VROOM! VROOM!* the sound again and it was coming from Alex’s wide swords.

“Oh shit! You’re that fucker who killed his entire family with a chainsaw! Oh shit man! Look I’m sorry! Spare me please. I’m begging you” the man pleaded, tears streaming down his face, hands in a praying position as Alex came closer with his mini-chainsaws.

“…did you ever have any siblings?” Alex asked looking like the grim fucking reaper in the man’s eyes.

“Oh god please, I don’t want to die” the man prayed while trying to crawl away.

“There is no such thing as god or the devil! Now answer the question” Alex demanded grabbing the man by the leg. “Did you or do you not have any siblings?”

“Yes man yes! A little brother and two sisters” the man exclaim.

“How’s about a mother, a father” Alex asked?

“My mom but my dad left us when she gave birth to me” the man cried.

“A pity, I can sympathize” Alex explained in a moment of sympathy before revving his blades one more time. The man’s eyes darted all around the room, looking for some way out, some hope of escape when he spied the bartender once more who was simply cleaning a cup with a rag.

“Bartender! Help me! Call the guards! Call the warden! Call anyone!” the man pleaded. The bartender continued to clean the glass in his hand but did not look up.

“Why should I help someone who doesn’t even know my name” and with that the man’s last thread of hope was severed.

“Um Mike, Micheal, Barry, Rick” the man pleaded but the bartender continued to clean the glass like nothing was happening as Alex brought his blades even closer.

“…” Alex didn’t speak but mouthed something over the sound of his chainsaws.

Tell my sister I said hello…

And then that was it! Alex drove his two chainsaws into the man’s two arms. The man screamed in pure agony as his two arms fell to the ground.

“M-mitch. You’re name’s Mitch” the man yelled.

“Too late” the bartender explained holding up the glass to the light, allowing it to show the man his demented reflection just before Alex carved into the man’s throat, splattering blood all over him and part of the carpet that the two men…well one man and a soon to be corpse, were standing on.

“…and dead” Alex gasped as the man’s horribly severed head and body fell to the floor.

“Good riddance” Mitch exclaimed with emotionless tone of voice.
155211.title: Hell? Heaven? It doesn’t matter!

1552111.content:
After turning back towards the bartender Alex took out his wallet only for the bartender to shake his head and tell him it was all on the house. Alex let a small smile escape and left to return to his room in order to both clean up and relax. He had worked up a sweat from killing that White Trash guy and wanted something besides food to take his mind off the subject.

…

Later after one long shower, a bit of mouthwash and some Q tips, Alex exited the washroom and walked past several prisoners, one of them a man with spiky hair who would look good with a eye patch if he ever lost an eye.

“You…never mind” Alex explained walking away from the man who simply gave a shrug.

‘I wonder what that was about’ the man asked as he continued on his way.

…

Soon Alex arrived at his room; however it wasn’t like one of the other normal prisoner’s cells. This looked almost like a small apartment; there was a fridge along with an electric stove right beside it in the far corner of the roof. Besides those was a chrome sink with several dishes inside it.

“Looks like I have to do the dishes...”Alex groaned walking up to the sink and putting on some rubber gloves that were a dull red color.

A few minutes later Alex finally had the chance to sit down in what appeared to be a black lounge chair. Alex quickly removed his long coat and sat it on a coat rack that was next to the chair. He then took out his two chainsaw swords and, after pulling out a somewhat large folding table, sat the two blades down. Alex quickly turned to his left and reached besides the lounge chair before pulling out a medium size tool box. He quickly sat the tool box onto the table, a few inches from the blades but close enough so he could reach without having to strain himself.

Alex slowly reached for the tool box and gently opened it, as if tending to some sort of fragile glass sculpture that would break if he used too much force. And then, with a small clang, the tool box was opened, revealing an assortment of tools, ranging from your basic screw drives and hammers to what seemed like handmade tools of some sort. Only Alex knew what those ‘special’ tools were used for and he wasn’t about to show and tell.

Regardless Alex removed a screw driver from the box and grabbed one of the chainsaw blades before then proceeding to unscrew and remove the covering that held the inner blade of the chainsaw in check. However before Alex could do anymore the door suddenly opened and a man garbed in a grey business suit walked in followed by two identical looking twins.

“Ah, Mr. Reaper, I’m glad I caught you” explained the man as he walked forward towards Alex.

“…” Alex ignored the man as he continued the maintenance on his swords. The man took this as a sign to continue talking and so he did.

“You see Reaper, today there was supposed to be a match between you and a deadman named Eagle. Yet here I find that not only did you ignore the call for your fight but you also went to a bar and chainsawed an innocent convict in half. Now what was our arrangement again, hmm?” the man wanted an answer and Alex reluctantly replied. He didn’t like speaking with this man, in fact if he could Alex would’ve carved up this bastard long ago but their ‘arrangement’ put an end to any thoughts like that.

“I do matches for you and you keep me from the firing squad” Alex explained looking the man dead in the eye.

“Good now I expect a great make up fight from you tomorrow, this time instead of just one deadman there will be two. Oh the viewers will be happy with this line up. The Grim Reaper vs. The Eagle and The Hawk, two titans of speed versus the man with the glare of utter death! Ooh how fun” the man laughed taking far too much pleasure in the thought of Alex killing or being killed.

“Now if you’ll excuse me I have to finish maintenance on my blades. Or else do you want to see me lose?” Alex’s question made the man named Tamaki smile wickedly adding even more too why Alex hated the man, his smile! It gave him the creeps which is why he quickly got up and pushed him out of outside.

“Remember 8 sharp” Tamaki explained before finally exiting the room along with the two twins.

With this Alex was alone once more…

“…” Alex suddenly gripped his fist and promptly slammed it into the wall, creating a large hole that was about twice the size of his fist. “Damn you Tamaki! Damn you” Alex cursed slamming his other fist into the wall, creating another large hole in the wall.

…

That night Alex made sure that his blades were in complete working order before climbing into his bed which was nothing more than a black futon only without the frame.

“Damn Tamaki!” Alex groaned rolling around on the futon mattress, trying in a futile attempt to get comfortable.

…

“GAH, FUCK I CAN’T SLEEP” Alex screamed out as he tossed and turned. He had been trying to sleep for several hours and by his internal clock he could tell that it was either late at night or early morning. Alex’s room had no windows after all so he could only guesstimate. Still his body clock usually wasn’t wrong however tonight was different. For some reason he couldn’t fall asleep. Maybe it was due to the fact that he had consumed several glasses of alcohol but no that couldn’t be it! Maybe he was hungry? No he had made sure to eat a good helping of ramen noodles and beef along with a tall glass of OJ (orange juice).

“Wait a minute…that OJ! I don’t remember getting that from the vending machine! That bastard Tamaki must’ve slipped it in the fridge while I was at the bar. Damn it” Alex growled slamming a heavy fist into the mattress.
1552111.title: Later that day...

15521112.content:
After another hour of unsuccessful sleep, Alex finally decided…

“To hell with it, that fucker Tamaki drugged me and now I can’t sleep at all. Might as well walk around to get my mind going at least I’ll have a plan when I go into battle instead of going just plain tired and shit out of luck.” Alex explained to no one in particular. Alex quickly got dressed and headed for the gym, the idea was to think while training but as Alex rounded the corner he saw that of Crazy Bitch herself, Miss Rei Takashima! Alex immediately shuddered, that bitch was the only woman he truly feared! As for the Warden Makina, Alex didn’t fear her so much as admire her. Though he had no interest in her romantically, he had given up on romance ever since those bastard popular girls at school played with his emotions only to kick him in the balls, both literally and figuratively!

Anyway back to reality and the Crazy Bitch down the hall. She was talking to another person garbed in a lab coat, a scientist maybe?

“…Regardless I think we should crack open that case and dissect the Wretched Egg” Crazy Bitch explained.

‘Wretched Egg’ Alex thought to himself ‘What is she talking about?’

“But if we do that then she might escape and kill us a-“

“I don’t want excuses! I don’t care what the director says! I want that case open and that bitch on my table yesterday” Crazy Bitch demands getting right into the scientist face!

“But-“

“Damn it, either get the job done or I’ll do the job myself! God you’re so incompetent” Crazy Bitch groaned putting an end to the scientist’s arguing. It was then that the two began to walk off which is when Alex decided he’d spend his sleepless night finding out what exactly this ‘Wretched Egg’ was. Besides what else could he do, that damn drugged OJ was still very much in effect!

…

A little bit of following, copying batman, and stopping for a piss break later Alex had found what appeared to be a secret entrance to the so called ‘G-Block’. Thinking about it, wasn’t he already in G-Block? Wait maybe this was an entrance to a secret laboratory in hidden deep within G-Block. Yeah that’s what it was! (Thank you plot hole ^_^)

Anyway Alex, like the somewhat ninja he was, entered the entrance and quickly climbed up onto the hatch so that he would not be seen in case somebody had called the elevator from bellow!

‘All answers point to down eh? Well as I recall, the beast usually sleeps in the deepest part of the dungeon. At least that’s how my old rpg games did it.’

“…”

“God I miss my play station >_<!” Alex groaned as the elevator comes to a sudden stop.

“Hey did you hear something” asked a random voice from bellow?

“Hmm no.” replies another voice from bellow.

“Oh, must’ve been the elevator. I’ll call someone later about repairs” explains a third voice.

Up above Alex was doing his best impression of a silent mime while trying not to get caught. This soon paid off as the elevator came to a sudden stop causing Alex to almost fall right back into the elevator and onto the three people bellow. Fortunately he was able to keep his balance and the three men bellow were none the wiser.

Alex waited patiently as the three men bellow exited the elevator and then made his move, quickly dashing down into the elevator before bolting outward and into the secret laboratory of Deadman Wonderland.

////INFILTRATION COMPLEATE\\

“Weird I feel a sudden metal gear reference coming on” Alex exclaimed in a moment of nostalgia.

“Show time” Alex exclaims striking pose similar to that of a famous eye patched secret agent who was featured in a recent addition of a game baring the initials SSBB!

“Now to make like snake and find the nearest card board box” Alex exclaimed barrel rolling across a nearby hallway until finally he arrived at what looked to be a control room of some sort. Alex quickly looks at the control panel and spies that of a large red button “Hmm…ooh what does this button do” Alex asks, making another reference to a certain classic cartoon character from another famous laboratory? Immediately Alex’s curiosity got the better of him as he quickly pushed the button unaware of what the aftereffect would be.

“WARNING! WARNING THE SELFDESTRUCT SEQUENCE HAS BEEN ACTIVATED! ALL PER-“

“Whoopsie, wrong button” Alex grasps in a comedic fashion before promptly pushing several other buttons on the control panel.

“Wretched Egg release protocol initiated! Warning all guards report to the control room” call an automated alarm.

“Oh shit! Out of references and almost out of time. Crap and well at least it can’t get worse” Alex laughs insanely as the door to the control room opened.


//// ! \\

“Hey what are you doing here?” asked a guard before promptly pointing his gun at Alex.

“Oh shit…umm sorry I thought this was the bathroom. My bad” Alex explains scratching the back of his head.

“Oh? Well the bathrooms down the hall. You must be new here and…hey wait a minute! You were trying to pull a fast one on me weren’t you? Come on fess up” the guard demanded!

“You got me, I’m secretly a sexy cat lady only masquerading as a death row inmate in order to feed my dying aunt who has some in curable disease, NYAH” Alex explains striking a pose like a neko cat girl, unaware that there was a large being slowly levitating upward and behind him just past the glass.

“Oh shit she’s out! The Wretched Egg is out” the guard exclaimed just as several other generic security guards made their way to the control room.

“Hmm well then I guess I traded in a few omelets for…”

“One.”

“Bad.”

“Egg!” Suddenly the glass behind Alex exploded inwardly sending several huge pieces at Alex and the guards. However Alex simply took it and let the glass penetrate his back and spine.

“GAH!” screamed the guard who Alex was talking to prior, as he fell to the ground bleeding out like a uncorked bottle of gin!

“EVERYONE OPEN FIRE” screamed one of the remaining guards as all the remaining guards began to open fire with their weapons.

“Hmm this seems oddly familiar…oh I know this reminds me of that anime Elfen L-“Alex was cut off as the Wretched Egg sent him flying forward into the stream of bullet, only for that stream of bullets to fly back at the ones who fired them!

“Time for the ants to die” the Wretched Egg exclaimed with what seemed to be a female voice as a wicked smile crossed her metal masked face. It was then that Alex was bulled back by what seemed to be a huge back draft only to be flung forward once more by an equally sudden blast of air!

“Well this is gonna be-“however before Alex could finish his joke he was sent flying through several stone walls.

…


“Ow…” Alex groaned after waking up a couple of minutes later only to see that of the Wretched Egg standing right before him.

“So…you were the one freed me?” it asked, still sounding a malice and psychotic as ever.

“Yeah, though I honestly didn’t think you’d cheap shot me like that to be perfectly honest” Alex explains standing back up and dusting himself off.

“Cheap shot? Oh you mean the broken glass and the back attack” the Wretched Egg explained in a somewhat asking tone.

“Yeah, I have the glass and scrapes in my back to prove it, not to mention what happened to my coat” Alex groaned turning around to show his wounded back.

“Heh I can fix your wounds” the Wretched Egg explained with a sadistic laugh.

“Oh that’d be great but how-“ suddenly the Wretched Egg pulls it’s arm back as if winding up for a punch and then shoves its entire hand into Alex’s chest, more specifically just about an inches above his collar bone right on his neck!

“GAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
15521112.title: Meeting the Wretched Egg...

choices: Wake up to the sight of Crazy Bitch dissecting Alex
Wake up to Wretched Egg? Huh why isn't she attacking?
155211121.content:
“It burns, GAH!” a now helpless Alex screamed collapsing to the ground. Soon Alex began to foam at the mouth as if having a severe stroke/seizure.

“Heh don’t you like it? Soon you’ll fall into unconsciousness and when you wake up you won’t have to worry about dying.” The Wretched Egg said as a huge smirk crosses her lips. However before she could take anymore enjoyment out of Alex’s pain he suddenly grabbed her by the leg.

“F-fuck you” Alex curse as he shakily got to his feet only to immediately collapse to his knees.

“Heh such a strong will. I like that. Maybe you’ll provide more of a challenge than the old man” The Wretched Egg laughed.

“STOP LAUGHING AT ME” Alex roared delivering a devastating punch to the Wretched Egg’s chest, sending her flying into a wall.

“*putto* You really are strong. Well then I guess I won’t have to wait for your branch of sin to kick in. Let’s fi-“

“SHUT UP” Alex screamed quickly running forward, grabbing the Wretched Egg by the face and slamming her head into the concrete floor. However before Alex could make another move of attack the Wretched Egg unleashed a sudden blast of wind from her body which sent Alex flying through a number of walls.

“Ow…” Alex groaned after finally stopping. “Wait…this is my room. How’d I get…wait THAT BITCH THREW ME THROUGH THE ENTIRETY OF G-BLOCK! What the fuck?!” Alex immediately snapped back to the current crisis as the Wretched Egg flew up from the huge hole in the floor that took up a huge chuck of Alex’s room.

“That’s for smashing my head into the floor” the Wretched Egg exclaimed, vengeance clearly present in her tone of voice!

“Oh yeah I throw your face into the ground and you throw me through half of G-Block. Yeah that sounds fair” Alex exclaims in a sarcastic tone of voice as he dusts himself off.

“Ooh did I damage your coat? Too bad that won’t be the only thing I destroy tonight” The Wretched Egg laughed before landing about seven feet from Alex.

“Oh yeah we’ll see about that…” Alex says with a smirk as he quickly darts his eyes around the room before quickly spying his twin chain saw blades about two feet behind the Wretched Egg. ‘Damn, if I could only get to the blades then I could cut this chick down to size…wait she’s shorter than me. Yeah by a good three inches…Ah shit why did I have to notice that?’ Alex groans to himself, scratching his head in confusion.

“Hey look over there” Alex roars “I think It’s Ganta Igarashi!” Immediately the Wretched Egg whirls around giving Alex the opportunity to make a dash for his weapons! In a matter of seconds Alex had grabbed his chainsaws and had already revved them up. “GOT’CHA” he roared causing the Wretched Egg to whirl around only to be struck by one of the chainsaws, in her neck!

“Die! Die! DIE YOU UNHOLY BITCH” Alex screamed no ROARED as his chainsaw dug into the Wretched Egg’s esophagus and in turn her wind pipe, killing her instantly! However Alex didn’t stop there and continued to dig deeper and deeper until the Wretched egg’s entire head!

“*pant* t-there*pant* dead *pant*” Alex gasped exhaustedly dropping his chainsaws out of pure exhaustion before collapsing to the floor himself. “*pant* At least *pant she dead *pant…” It was then that a familiar laughter pierced Alex’s ears like a bullet to the brain! “N-no way” Alex gasped look up to see that of the Wretched Egg headless corpse holding it’s disembodies head.

“Looks like I’m harder to kill than you thought” the disembodied head said with a bone chilling cackle.

“No…damn it!” Alex cried, tears beginning to form in the corner of his eyes.

“Hey don’t cry I’ll make sure that I kill you quickly since you put up such an entertaining fight.” The Wretched Egg explained as she put her head back on the stump where it originally stood. In a moment of sheer horror the Wretched Egg’s head was reattached and to add even more horror, it now looked like the whole beheading had never happened.

“D-damn it” Alex groaned trying to stand up but it was all in vain as the Wretched Egg quickly delivered a bone shattering leg sweep causing Alex to crash into the floor with a very hard thud! “Ah…my head” Alex groaned as he tried to move once more only to find his entire body paralyzed and one of his eyes bleeding profusely. ‘Did I have an aneurism? Oh god I think my head is bleeding. I taste applesauce, why do I taste applesauce?’

“Heh” *crunch*

“AAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH” Alex screams out in agony as the Wretched Egg has just slammed her foot onto his spine, snapping it in half with a single strike!

“Oh come on what happened to all that spirit you had earlier” The Wretched Egg asked as she continued to stomp on Alex’s spine, snapping it again and again until it was at least twenty different pieces. However suddenly the Wretched Egg stopped and for a moment Alex was granted a reprieve, partially due to the fact his spine was in so many pieces that and he no longer could feel any pain.

“Is that…a lullaby?” Alex asked before subsiding into unconsciousness.

…

“Amazing...” echoed female voice.

‘Crazy Bitch?’ Alex thought to himself as his eyes flickered open. There before him was that of Crazy Bitch herself, Rei Takashima, and some weird guy with black hair who was cracking his neck a lot. ‘W-who’s that guy?’

“Apparently he went toe to toe with the Wretched Egg, not to mention destroyed half of G-Block” explained the neck cracker guy.

‘Yeah thank you captain obvious…uhh I feel like hell’ Alex internally groaned but the two heard him.

“Oh my, he’s still alive” Crazy Bitch exclaimed in a bit of shock and awe.

“My my how interesting. I guess Tamaki was right to let him join us Undertakers” explained the neck cracker guy as he looked right into my face.

‘Why can’t I move? Uhh…my head hurts. I think I’m gonna-‘however before Alex could finish his thought he passed out once more.
155211121.title: Fighting the Wretched Egg...

choices: He doesn't find her but instead runs into another Undertaker...
1552111211.content:
âThree months ago, on the night I killed my familyâ

âI remember the tasteâ¦the taste of blood and flesh. I remember the flavor of the severed limb of my sister as I sunk my teeth into her thigh. It tasted bitter, salty, and revolting. God I donât know how those zombies in all those horror movies love this stuff.â

âThen the cops showed upâ¦I felt sleepy and dreamt up something strange. However when I awoke I forgot what I was dreaming about and found myself in a police station.â

âAll the officers looked at me as if I was a monster but was I? No Iâm not, at least in my opinion. Regardless after several hours one of the officers said I had a visitor. â

â¦

There be for me, sat in a wheel chair was that of an old man. He was dress in an outfit straight out of hospital and he looked rather ill. Yet even with this he smiled at me. At first I thought it weird as I had never seen this old geezer in my entire life but then he introduced himself.

âMy name is Hagire, Hagire Rinchirōâ he said, introducing himself. âPlease, would you care to give me your name?â


âAlex, Alexanderâ I explained reaching one of my hands outwards towards the old man for a hand shake only to realize that my hands were cuffed together. However the old man quickly remedied this by coming closer regardless to the officersâ warnings.

âAlex, a nice nameâ he said smiling as he shook my hand. âNow do you mind telling me why you are imprisoned?â

The old man was an odd one that was for sure! None of the officers really seemed to care to ask, favoring to trust the report over what the actual criminal had to say. Thatâs all I was to them, a criminal that they only wanted gone, a monster they only wanted put down. But then there was this old man, who actually care what I had to say, if not he at least had the ball to ask me what happened. So I decided what the hell and told him.

ââ¦I see so all of your family is dead, but what about your mother? You said you barely touched her.â The old man asked crossing his hands placing his chin on top of where they connected.

âYeah, I didnât do anything really serious to her because she was the only one that I cared about. I didnât want to hurt her, just get her out of the way so I could get to the real problemâ I explained crossing my legs crisscross applesauce on the cold concrete cell floor while folding my arms.

âI see so you didnât want to hurt her. Oh I if I remember correctly you have a locketâ the old man said making me groan a bit.

âI âhadâ a locket. The police took it from me while I was unconscious.â I explained pouting.

âOh you mean this one?â the old man quickly reached into his pocket and pulled out a silver locket.

âMY LOCKET! Please give it to meâ I pleaded almost screaming at the old man.

âNow now Iâll give it to you on one conditionâ he explained tossing the locket to me.

âYeah what do you want, first dibs on killing me?â I asked sarcastically and the old man simply laughed.

âOh no I have something much more important for you than just dying. I want you to come with meâ¦â the old man explained. ââ¦ to be an Undertaker in my Deadman Wonderland.â

And that was it! That was how I came to Deadman Wonderland. But why am I thinking of this? Am I dead? Did that bitch Wretched Egg kill me? No I still can feel my heart beating...

*Bump, bump*

Yeah I can hear my heart beat, must be Iâm in some really bad shape but whatâs this? I feelâ¦warm? And I see somethingâ¦a color, red. Blood! Iâm bleedâ¦wait thatâs right! Iâm bleeding out! Fuck no Iâm not dying till I kick that Wretched Egg bitchâs ass!

â¦

Up somewhere in one of the other blocks, Rei Takashima was experimenting with latest guinea pig, it was the Undertaker who had went toe to toe with the wretched Egg and had in the middle of the fight, destroyed half of G-Block. However suddenly while she was slicing open the victimâs heart in order to test her theory that the Wretched Egg has implanted a Red Crystal inside the victimâs chest. However she was a bit off target as the actual red crystal was in lodged in the victimâs throat.

Suddenly the Cardiac Monitor, which was reading a steady line signally the victimâs death, began to beep at a rapid pace!

âFUUUUUUCCCCCCCCCKKKKKKKKKKKKKâ the victim began to scream as his eyes shot open right as Rei had a scalpel to his heart.

âB-but thatâs impossible! You were deadâ Rei gasps in shock, accidently stabbing the victim in the left part of her heart.

âTake it out! Get THE HELL OFFâ he screamed when suddenly Alexâs blood began to move and form together to create what seemed like combat tentacles. Immediately Alex grabbed Rei by the throat and threw her aside. Rei came to a crashing halt as she collided with a large bookshelf containing many medical and research texts which promptly fell and buried her.

âOwâ¦wait what the fu-â Rei didnât finished that sentence as she was in awe. Before her the very person, who she had ripped open and gutted like a trout, was now undergoing a process of self regeneration! Tentacles of blood shot out from the victimâs body, before quickly reseeding and then shooting out once more. It was almost like they were trying to grab something!

âWait thatâs it!â the sudden realize hit Rei like a ton of bricks âhe must be trying to regain the organs I removed!â

Indeed this was the case as several blood tentacles shot out from various other parts of Alexâs body such as an empty eye socket, the mouth, even the lower abdomen. Soon after this the victimâs eye, his tongue, as well as several other vital and not so vital appendages were brought back to their corresponding places. Then the blood tentacles began to form what looked like stitches as they reattached the formally missing pieces to the rest of the body.

âFascinatingâ Rei said truly amazed at the brutal yet elegant display of precision and science! It was then that she was struck by something. She glanced over to see that of a large blood tentacle piercing her left shoulder blade. âGAHâ Rei cried out in pain only to be immediately silenced by some sort of ooze like substance which was actually blood.

âYou did this to meâ Alex wheezed, trying to stand up from the bed âDidnât you?â

ââ¦â Rei didnât speak which only made Alex angrier. He quickly leaped from the bed and grabbing her by the throat!

âYou have five seconds to answer before I use my new powers to cut you open like a thanksgiving turkey!â Alex croak, his voice box still regenerating which made his voice sound all the more terrifying. Rei immediately nodded to which Alex responded with a bloody fist to the face! âBitchâ Alex growled as his voice finally returned. âNow where the fuck is that Wretched Egg?â Alex roared as he left the doctorâs office in search of his next target.
1552111211.title: Awaken: Branch of sin! Bloody Tentacle...

choices: Shiro suddenly appears stopping the fight!
15521112112.content:
“*Yawn*w-where am I” yawn a pure white albino girl with a just as white full body suit as she awoke to find herself in a dark room.

“Ah I see you’re awake, Shiro” said voice. The girl named Shiro turned around to see that of an old man.

“Grampa” Shiro exclaimed happily as she ran up to the old man and gave him a nice warm hug.

“Heh, yes it’s good to see you as well” the old man said sincerely.

“It’s been so long, I missed you” Shiro said burying her head into the man’s chest.

“Yes I know, now Shiro I have a very special job for you” the old man began.

“Sure anything Grampa” Shiro exclaims anxiously.

“Good, good. Now I need you to listen very closely…” and with that the old man told Shiro his plan to which Shiro nodded and bolted for a nearby vent. She only stopped to turn around and wave goodbye and then left.

…

“Where is she?” roared an enraged Alex as he limped his way through the halls of some random sector.

“Hey Alex, long time no see” called a familiar voice. Alex immediately whirled around to see that of Guitar Hero himself, Azuma Genkaku.

“…” Alex was about to turn right back around when Genkaku stopped him.

“Hey now is that any way to treat a friend? Especially an Uber Monk like me” he asked placing a friendly hand Alex’s shoulder.
