“Get off of me” Alex roared unintentionally sending Genkaku sliding down the hall. Genkaku however remained on his feet and merely smiled.

“So I see you got yourself a branch of sin. Nice, congrats buddy” Genkaku said in his usual laid back tone of voice.

“I’m not your BUDDY” Alex roared firing a number of blood tentacles at Genkaku who merely flashed his skull necklace forward, neutralizing the attack.

“Hey easy there buddy, I don’t want to fight you, honest! Besides you’re far too strong” Genkaku explained picking his ear with his finger.

“Shut up! All I want to do is kill that Wretched Egg! She did this to me! She made me into this freak” Alex roared looking at his palm which was covered in bloody stitches as he had begun calling the strands of blood that helped heal his body.

“Whoa maybe you should go see the doc-“

“Shut up! That bitch cut me open and tried to tear out my heart! Hell she almost did but I woke up just as she was inserting the scalpel” Alex explained.

“Really? Wow I’d hate to wake up only to find some chick with a needle in me.” Genkaku explained sounding sympathetic.

“Well if you really care that much then how’s about you tell me where that Wretched Egg is” Alex demanded reading another set of blood tentacles.

“To be honest, I haven’t got a clue” Genkaku explained scratching the back of his head.

“LIER” Alex roared sending a second onslaught of blood tentacles at Genkaku, only for him to flash his skull necklace forward again. However this time Alex stopped his attack just mere inches from Genkaku in order to avoid the affect of his Worm Eater skull, and then bolted forward and punched Genkaku straight in the chest, sending him flying!

…

A little farther down the hall, near a vending machine Hibana Daida was in the middle of getting a snack from the vending machine when suddenly Genkaku came flying out from around the corner.

“G-Genkaku?!” she gasped, having never seen Genkaku injured before she was in shocked. Not so much as really caring for him, just surprised that he was injured.

“H-hey Hibana” Genkaku cough, a small trace of blood coming out with each cough “what’s up?”

“Who did this to you” Hibana asked concerned.

“Well it sure wasn’t one of my adoring fans” Genkaku laughed before another voice caused the two to stare directly down the hallway.

“Where is she? Tell me where she is Genkaku! I know you know where to find that Wretched Egg. Tell me where she is damn it” the voice roared.

“Wait is that the guy who fought the Wretched Egg” Hibana asked a little scared.

“Yep, his names Alex and he thinks I know where the Wretched Egg is, whatever that is” Genkaku explained as he stood up and lit a smoke.

“What’s a Wretched Egg? Is that some sort of food” Hibana asked before suddenly several thousand blood tentacles shot out from the darkness causing her to quickly withdraw her sword-whip in order to block the attack. However even though she managed to block the attack, the sheer power behind the attack was enough to make her slid back towards Genkaku (She had to move in front of him in order to block the attack).

“*pant* Tell me *pant* where she *pant* is, Genkaku” Alex gasped exhaustedly, having used most of his blood in that last attack, rendering him almost anemic.

“You need to chill out man…” Genkaku began taking a deep breath of his cigarette “…how’s about taken a shot to calm down?” Genkaku then immediately took out his V Nirvana guitar and aimed it at Alex.

“I don’t know what’s going on but seeing as how you are destroying everything…” Hibana began as she readied her sword “…it’s time for your punishment!”
15521112112.title: Rampage! The Search for the Wretched Egg!

choices: Yes (Skip to the date of Alex's next encouter with WE)
No (Other stuff can happened in the mean time)
155211121121.content:
“You won’t tell me where she is? Then I’ll beat the shit out of you until you do” Alex roars, pulling all of his blood tentacles back into his body. He knew that the two undertakers were equipped with Worm Eater, a device designed specifically to negate the powers of a branch of sin user like him.

“Here, I’d like to show you something I recently composed; I call it Death’s Blossom” Genkaku explained as he quickly took out a guitar pick from his pocket and began to strum some strange melody on his guitar only for Alex to immediately be sent flying. Alex screamed in agony as he was shot thru a wall, something you’d think he’d have become accustom to by now.

“Cheer up once your knocked out you’ll feel a lot better. Though you’d probably feel even better if I just killed you” Genkaku explained as he and Hibana advanced closer. Alex merely groaned and stood up, his muscles and internal organs were still recovering from that Crazy Bitch’s dissection and it would be quite a while before he’d be at full capacity again.

“You know Genkaku to tell you the truth…” Alex began standing up.

“Yeah what’s that?” Genkaku asked as he and Hibana were within reach.

“I’m more of a techno man; here I’ll even tell you my favorite song…” Alex begins as he begins to hum a melody in his head. “It’s called: Stamp on the ground! Now Jump, jump, jump” Alex sung jumping up and down to the beat inside his head.

“What are-“Hibana was cut off as suddenly Alex’s jumps began to shake the entire floor causing the two veteran undertakers to fall on their backs. “What the…? How can he be that heavy, he’s not even that huge” Hibana asked?

“Stamp on the ground! Make the room go BOOM! BOOM!! BOOM!!!” Alex sang/roared as the entire floor around him finally collapsed sending him as well as Hibana and Genkaku to the floor bellow. However just before they could get the chance to land Alex used his blood tentacles to destroy the floor bellow causing Genkaku and Hibana to fall even farther but Alex himself simply shot out a handful of blood tentacles and used them to stop his decent. “Man this place is really gonna need a major over hall after I leave” Alex laughed as he descended to the floor where Hibana and Genkaku now were.

“Ow that really hurt” Hibana groans as she stands back up, she had suffered some minor injuries, a few scrapes and bruises but otherwise she was still able to fight. Genkaku faired even better and other than a small bit of pain in his legs he was fine!

“Heh that was a nice trick you pulled there…” Genkaku laughed lighting another smoke, having lost the old one in the fall. “Now here’s one of mine, Bullet storm!” Suddenly Alex was bombarded by a hail of compressed air bullets, knocking him into, but not through, a nearby wall. This caused Alex to upchuck blood unintentionally as he slid down the concrete wall until he was finally on equal ground with Gekaku and Hibana.

“Damn that hurt” Alex groaned as he tried his best to stand up, to be truthful Alex didn’t feel well. Perhaps it was too much use of his blood or all those hits from Genkaku’s V-nirvana but he was done! If he continued to fight now…no! If he even tried to do anything more than recover and regenerate then his body would fall apart!

“So…what’s it gonna be man finally giving up? But if not then hopefully you’ll last long enough for-“

“Genkaku…” Alex interrupted sounding truly exhausted and a lot more like his normal self.

“Yeah” Genkaku asked a little surprised by Alex’s tone?

“I give up” Alex explains “My body’s too banged up. Hell I don’t even think I can stand up anymore than this” Alex explained barely managing to even lift himself off the ground. Genkaku smiled warmly as he shifted his guitar onto his back and began to walk forward.

“It could be a trick” Hibana warned the foolish Genkaku.

“If he was gonna kill us then we would’ve already been struck by now. Besides…” Genkaku stopped speaking for a moment as he stopped right in front of the exhausted berserker that was Alex. Genkaku quickly picked Alex up by the shoulder and helped him walk. “…we undertakers have to stick together” Genkaku explained not showing his face as he and Alex walked off for destinations unknown.

…

A little while later in Genkaku’s room, Alex was being patched up with thanks to the help of Genkaku who seem to have lots of bandages in his room for some odd reason. Alex’s entire body was wrapped in bandages now; his legs as well as his feet were wrapped in tight yet flexible bandages that allowed Alex to move free.

“Here you can take these since I’m sure your usually pair of slacks were ripped to hell in that last fight” Genkaku explained walking outside of his backroom with a pair of dark crimson gym slacks. Alex turned his head slightly as Genkaku walked up behind him; Genkaku had switched to his causal outfit which consists of a tank top and some slacker pants. Although Alex did take note that Genkaku had put his hair in a sort of spiky ponytail as Genkaku sat back down on the couch with him.

“Here” Genkaku said as he handed Alex the gym slacks before quickly turning away. Alex nodded and carefully slipped on his new pair of pants which he did admit looked good on him. Genkaku did always have good taste in clothes, even his monk outfit made Alex a bit jealous of how the cool it made the Uber-monk look. Not that he’d say that aloud of course! Alex wasn’t like that, not personality wise anyway, which for some reason that didn’t seem to both him for the last few days which have show to be the most expressive days for the past year!

“T-…Thanks Genkaku” Alex stuttered out, he didn’t often thank people and when he did it rare. Genkaku was a bit shocked at that but nodded and quickly lit a smoke.

“Hey it’s nothing man. You were just all high off branch of sin and just went a little crazy. Heh not a problem, after all I cleansed you of all your transgressions and am going to look after you until your fully recovered” Genkaku explained with his whole Uber monk speal tied in to make it authentic.

‘Of course, after all, we may be on camera’ Alex thought to himself as he looked directly 20 degrees left and about 60 degrees up, into a hidden spy camera. ‘Hello Tamaki.’

Now how’s about we move on for now?

Skip a few days?
155211121121.title: Genkaku the Uber Monk, my friend...

1552111211211.content:
Several days, one painful surgery, and a few guitar solos from Genkaku later, Alex was back to his usual normal average self. He had almost entirely forgotten about the Wretched Egg which came at a surprise to him as he had almost gone on another rampage the day before and again three days before that. However for some reason Alex just couldn’t do it, he didn’t have the energy to fight. A result of this was that he no longer could participate in Carnival Corpse which Alex didn’t mind one bit! After all, not having to risk your ass every few days because of Tamki breathing down your neck was almost a god send in this place.

Regardless Alex now had lots of free time at his disposal but he honestly didn’t know what to do. He sometimes went to Mitch’s bar but often found he wasn’t in the mood to get smashed, though to be truthful he never really drank just to get drunk, never really that kind of guy, whatever that was? Mitch did however make Alex feel welcome and in exchange for a bit of info like Alex’s favorite color, red, and what hand Alex was, right, Mitch created something special from that secret mini-fridge he hides where no one can find it.

Other times Alex tried to hang out with Genkaku, and often ended up discussing things. Why the sky was blue, why they thought they would talk about why the sky was blue, along with other stuff. Some of it was just stupid stuff like the ladder and sometimes it was kind of deep. Like for example just yesterday they had an actual decent discussion about just why they were imprisoned. Kind of made the two closer in a way, perhaps a bond was forming between the two, a brotherhood, maybe? Nah! There was no way Alex would call Genkaku his younger brother, actually Genkaku was older then Alex as it turned out. How Alex learned of this was because it was one of the things the two talked about on one of their discussions days.

A few times Alex talked with Hibana…Alex didn’t want to talk to here again! She was too…polite, at least to sickeningly polite. Aparantly her mother did some really fucked up teaching while raising her ergo why she’s here. Regardless Alex did manage to find one thing in common with Hibana, their care for their weapons. Hibana used her tool to punish those she fought and Alex just used his to punish well… whoever deserved it. I guess that was another thing in they hand common, punishing the wrong, though Hibana’s sense of punishment, again, was far more twisted than Alex’s. Regardless Alex soon found himself visited by Hibana in order to repair her weapon or because as she put it “Thought he needed company.” Maybe she really was a sweat girl, or not? Alex sure wasn’t about to bother see which. He just enjoyed the company.

Life seemed rather normal, well as normal as an undertaker stuck in death row surrounded by other crazy murderous people can get. Anyway today was another new day, Alex had spent a majority of the night fixing Hibana’s sword-whip, he had managed to fix the blade so that it could once again separate and reconnect again. The reason he had to fix it was because Hibana had broken it accidently while carrying it around a few days again. Thinking that she would get scold if she showed anyone, and at a surprise to Alex, Hibana brought him her blade and asked him to fix it for her. Alex was surprised at first but the look in Hibana’s eyes just was too much and Alex promised that he’d fix it within a few days! Alex swore he never had seen Hibana smile before and it made him feel kind of glad that he accepted her cry for help.

Regardless Alex was just now waking up, Hibana’s weapon at his side, a fully opened tool set and scattered tools on the other. Alex stood up with a yawn and scratched his robe-covered side as he moved to the kitchen. After a quick mug of coffee, a nicely glazed doughnut, and a few whacks to the frontal lob Alex was officially awake!

“Heh didn’t think you’d ever wake up,” laughed a cynical yet cheerful voice. Alex almost dropped his coffee but the sheer look of shock on his face was enough to prove he was scared. Alex slowly took a breath and sat his coffee down before then turning to face none other than Wretched ‘Murder Incarnate’ Egg! Wretched Egg was missing her armor this time around and was only garbed in a white body suit of some sort. However Alex knew it was the same Wretched Egg as the one he had fought before all due to that demented devil smile on the albino skinned girl’s face.

“Hey…” she began before suddenly grabbing Alex by the face and smashing him into only cupboard that wasn’t on the ground “…you miss me?” Almost immediately cereal began to fall to the floor along with various other sweets that Alex had stashed here. Some of the cereal fell on the Wretched Egg but she either didn’t notice it or was too interested in Alex to care.

‘Lucky me’ Alex thought before looking back at the Wretched Egg who was nice enough to remove her hand from his face long enough for him to speak. “So what brings you to my room” Alex asked casually eyeing his surrounding as the Wretched Egg smiled wickedly and blinked her oddly beautiful blood red eyes.

“Oh I was just walking by and thought I’d stop in to see my favorite punching bag!” the Wretched Egg explained with a casual shrug. Alex quickly darted his eyes left as the Wretched Egg closed her eyes for a moment and spotted that of his coffee, still smoking hot and freshly brewed. In a sudden and almost spontaneous bit of movement Alex grabbed the glass mug of coffee before immediately splashing it in the Wretched Egg’s face just as she was reopening her eyes again.

“AGH” She screamed before Alex slammed and smacked the Wretched Egg across the head with the glass mug! The Wretched Egg couldn’t react fast enough as Alex thru off his robe and combat wrapped the Wretched Egg in it before then picking her up and smashing the Wretched Egg head first into the counter, smashing it to pieces!

Almost immediately Alex ran to grab his chainsaw but a bloody and badly pierced hand grabbed him by his ankle causing him to trip and fall to the ground.

“Where do you think you’re going?” the Wretched Egg asked as she tried to rip off the robe with her other hand which was far more busted up, hell the hand was nothing more moving pincushion!

“FUCK YOU” Alex screamed as he kicked the bitch er Wretched Egg in the face to almost no effect as the Wretched Egg merely smiled and continued to try to take the robe off.

“Gotcha” the Wretched Egg cheered as she finally managed to grab a part of the robe and quickly ripped it off but at the same time she accidently let go of Alex. She quickly looked up only for the full barrel of a revolver to be pressed against her for head.

“Bang” was all that was spoken and the Wretched Egg was shot through the head point blank, splattering what little gray matter she had left on the walls of the kitchen. Alex stood there, holding the still smoking gun, as he walked a little bit closer. “Five bullets left, good for five more deaths. Guess I’ll make some more coffee” he said to himself as he walked over to the still working coffee machine and got him another cup of coffee, even using the same mug as the one he had used to brutally beat the Wretched Egg with.

…

A short bit of time later the Wretched Egg was beginning to reawaken only to hear a sudden clanging, like that of glass against glass.

“Good morning” rung a familiar voice. The Wretched Egg quickly looked up only to stare down the barrel of a loaded revolver. The Wretched Egg gripped her fist, her body having fully regenerated while she was unconscious.

“How long have I been out” she asked sounding a bit defeated?

“Oh about fifty minutes” Alex replies as he sips some more coffee from his mug while still aiming a very loaded and very deadly revolver at the Wretch Egg’s head.

“And you didn’t take advantage of the situation” the Wretched Egg asked sounding a bit perverted.

“No, I mean why try. You were a corpse and I’m just not into that. Hey I may be insane but even I have standers” Alex explained “Which reminds me…” Alex then immediately pressed the gun fully against the Wretched Egg’s brow and then spoke “…I think theres something you want to ask me.”

The Wretched Egg smiled her usually devil like smile and spoke “How’d you know?” she asked with a sinister tone.

“Oh please I’m insane not stupid. You broke into here, and wanted to fight. But the hands on the other foot now so…” Alex explained and the Wretched Egg continued.

“…I’m going to make you an offer.” The Wretched Egg explained smiling even wider.

“I’m listening…”
1552111211211.title: A life that seemed so casual...

15521112112111.content:
“Hmm…” Alex wondered aloud.

“What do you think?” the Wretched Egg asked still very much in danger of being shot in the head again.

“Hmm…you’re still gonna try to kill me” Alex asked?

“Heh, not if you’re strong” the Wretched Egg explained, laughing a small chuckle.

“Hmm…what do I have to do?” Alex asked curiously while still not raising his gun an inch from the Wretched Egg.

“All you have to do is survive” she replied smiling wickedly.

“Deal” Alex exclaimed assertively before shooting the Wretched Egg dead center in the forehead!

…

About a half hour later the Wretched Egg awoke once more, though this time there wasn’t a gun to her forehead. Instead she was wrapped in a crimson red silk blanket with a somewhat bloody pillow where her head originally was. She quickly threw the blanket off and got up only to find a plate of food waiting for her, two eyes with a piece of bacon, all in the shape of a smile face.

“How-“however before the Wretched Egg could finish her thought her stomach growled. She had died twice now and her stomach was empty due to her body require a vast amount of energy to bring her back. The Wretched Egg quickly looked left and right, making sure no one was around and then devoured the bacon and eggs like a hungry alligator! *Burp*The Wretched Egg exclaimed before then proceeding to place the plate in the sink. “Hmm…still hungry” she groaned rubbing her stomach.

“Well that’s good, cause I just swung by the vending machine” Alex explained startling the Wretched Egg by his sudden appearance.

“Grr” she growled before he quickly pulled out his gun and put it to her forehead all in the span of a second!

“Three bullets left till I have to reload. One if you fight back. Zero if you manage to kill me” Alex explains. The Wretched Egg smiles and Alex smiles as well.

“Russian roulette?” asks The Wretched Egg?

“Sure” Alex exclaims immediately slamming the gun on the table and accidently setting off a round that shoots him in the gut. “Ow…” Alex groans before sitting down at the table.

“You going to be okay” The Wretched Egg mocked.

“Shut up and die” Alex spat back as his body began to regenerate. Soon Alex’s wound was healed and the bullet that originally was in his lower intestine now was on the table, oddly enough it was still intact. Just one more bullet in the chamber the two thought as Alex loaded it into the gun.

“Okay what do we shoot for” Alex asked?

“Why else? But for the thrill.” The Wretched Egg replied with a devious shrug.

“How’s about lose dies and winner…” Alex looks around his room and spies his horrible yet comfortable excuse for a bed. “Winner gets a FUTON!” Alex exclaimed with extra exclamation marks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!-before receiving a sudden punch to the face

“Anyway you go first…” the Wretched Egg begins, sliding the gun towards Alex.

“What are you scared” Alex taunted?

“No way!” The Wretched Egg exclaimed immediately snatching the gun from Alex’s hand and pulling the trigger.

…

A half hour later the Wretched Egg returned to the land of the somewhat living only to find the gun gone and Alex…five feet away with a bag of Cheetos in hand with some other prisoners standing by.

“See told you guys, half hour on the spot” Alex explained to the other prisoners.

“Whoa cool” exclaimed one of them.

“Creepy if you ask me” explained another before both were impaled through the skull with a blood tentacle from behind.

“Not that I don’t love mindless violence but why did you kill those two” The Wretched Egg asked standing up from the table?

“Thought you might be hungry, besides one of them is from Louisiana” Alex explained bring the corpses closer.

“Ew no!” The Wretched Egg exclaimed in protest.

“Heh, thought you would. Oh well. Shit I owe some guy five bucks” Alex explains causally as he tosses the two dead guys into the hall with his blood tentacles.

“You’re gross you know that” the Wretched Egg explained shoving a finger into Alex’s face.

“Bitch you’re calling me gross? Dude you can survive being torn to pieces, having every bone broken, and have your head. Your head mind you. CUT! OFF! AND STILL! SURVIVE!” Alex exclaimed with extra emphasis seeing as how HE was the one to cut the Wretched Egg’s head off! However a quick foot to the face sent Alex flying before being followed up by several bone shattering gut bunches. Alex retaliated with a kick of his own, well a knee but still, as he kneed Wretched Egg in the gut before then over head smashing her with his fists but before he could get one last move in the Wretched Egg quickly sprung up and gave a horribly painful elbow jab to one of Alex’s kidney’s.

“That was for calling me a bitch!” The Wretched Egg growled “Now where’s the bed!”

Alex feeling numb and yet still so very much in pain, pointed to the futon and the Wretched Egg gladly walked over and took what was rightfully hers.

“But I won” Alex coughed through bits og pain.

“Pecking order” the Wretched Egg laughed back.

“FUCK YOU!” Alex screamed before passing out due to pain.
15521112112111.title: Don't call me a bitch!

choices: Alex tries but fails to save the Wretched Egg...
155211121121111.content:
…

About nine hours later Wretched Egg awoke once more, this time she was awoke by a faint scream. She looked around and saw no one other than a still out cold Alex who seemed to have peacefully fallen asleep after so many hours of painful slumber. The Wretched Egg walked up to the sleeping dog that was Alex, yes, a dog for her to play with until it died! She smiled wickedly as she gave the ‘dog’ a sharp kick only for the ‘dog’ to bite back! In actuality Alex who, after being suddenly awoken along with being kicked in the ribs, was a little more than furious with his new ‘roommate’ and shot her twice. They were in none lethal areas mind you but the shots were enough to cause the Wretched Egg to grasp at her knees as she came crashing down!

“Let sleeping dogs lie” Alex explained grimly as he pointed his gun at the downed Wretched Egg.

“D-Damn you” the Wretched Egg cursed as Alex walked towards the door.

“Later, I gotta go find out what’s making all that noise” Alex explains as he grabbed his stuff along with Hibana’s sword-whip, before then walking off making sure to shut the light off before leaving the room.

…

Down bellow in a secret room that was long abandoned by the more secretive members of Deadman Wonderland, a being was screaming. The being was that of a man, his skin sliced and drenched in blood. He screamed out in pain as the agony of his flesh pierced his mind. And so he screamed!

…

Elsewhere Alex continued on his search for the source of the screams when he suddenly came across a random ventilation shaft.

‘Well time to do my best impression of a necromorph’ Alex began before taking in a deep breath.

“RRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH” Alex screamed before ripping off the vent and diving in head first! For a solid ten feet Alex just dropped, for another eleven he crashed and tumbled through the vent, and for another two feet Alex groaned his way to another ventilation shaft. With a solid kick Alex was freed from his confinement and now was in a room of absolute darkness.

“AAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH” screamed a voice that seemed like it came from every direction at once.

“Oh a screaming contest, eh? Well then…” Alex took in a deep breath. “AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

“…” the voice was silent, it seemed like Alex had impressed it.

“You have a loud mouth” groaned a somewhat familiar voice.

Suddenly the light flashed on and the gruesome carnage that was formally hidden by the darkness was revealed. The walls were painted with splashes of blood; dead bodies lined the battle field and oddly enough some of them even looked fresh.

“Now now Mr. Reaper I don’t believe you are supposed to be down here” explained a voice causing Alex to look at the center of the battlefield.

“Tamaki? What are you doing here” Alex asked a bit shocked to see the freaky bastard?

“Why? Well I heard someone set off the silent alarm and just always wanted to check this room out. Anyway Mr. Reaper I think I’ve had enough of your inability to listen” Tamaki explained in his usual venom tainted way of speaking.

“Oh yeah well I’m sick and tired of you always being creepy.” Alex reaches for his chainsaws but pulls out Hibana’s sword by mistake along with one of his chainsaws. ‘Must’ve grabbed the damn thing by mistake, oh well’ Alex shrugged before charging forward.

“Oh no, that won’t do at all, oh boys” Tamaki called before suddenly several armed Undertaker grunts appeared from the shadows and opened fire on Alex causing him to defend himself.

“Damn it” Alex gasped before as he shielded himself with Hibana’s blade. ‘Sorry Hibana it looks like I’m going to have to return your blade a little bit dirty!’ Alex thought to himself before he dropped his chainsaw and grabbed Hibana’s sword with his two hands. With a mighty swing Alex shot out the sword, engaging its whip function and slicing threw two of the undertaker grunts like a hot knife thru butter.

“I’ll leave you men to kill him, have fun Mr. Reaper. Our contract is expired” Tamaki warned before walking off.

“Expired eh? Well than guess I can finally kill you. Oh well I found a better boss! Her name’s the Wretched Egg!” Alex shouted only to say a moment later “Why the hell did I say that?” and face palm himself.

“Yeah and you’re doing a horrible job” called a voice from the shadows. Alex quickly turned only for a sudden blast to force him into the air. Out from the shadows walked that of the Wretched Egg in all her brutal glory.

“Oh yeah well…” Alex tried to think up something but suddenly collided with a large slate of solid black iron.

“Free me… ” whimpered a voice from inside the solid metal. Alex quickly grabbed onto the roof of the iron box and looked around before spying that of a tiny opening, just small enough for air to get in. “Free me I shall kill everything in your path…” the voice whispered once again. Alex nodded before he then quickly scaled the iron box and began revving his chainsaw.

“Yo Wretched Egg better stand clear” Alex shouted down bellow, unaware if she had heard him or not, as he began to chainsaw through the solid metal, which on normal circumstances this wouldn’t work but this iron cage was very rust and Alex’s chainsaw’s chain was made out of titanium! Do the math or don’t it’s about to get bloody all up in here! In a matter of seconds the rusty iron door came off and the door fell down to the floor bellow, crushing one undertaker grunt who was standing too close to the drop zone!

“You’re free” Alex shouted gleefully before suddenly a river of blood erupted from the iron box. There was so much blood pouring out of the iron cage that no normal human should be alive after apparently losing all their blood. Yet a blood drenched hand reached out from the iron box before then another and soon a badly bandaged head erupted from the shadows of the box.

“RAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH” the being screamed as blood fell from the cage like a waterfall both staining and drowning the battle field bellow. In a matter of seconds the being leapt from the iron box only to crash land right smack dab in the middle of the battle field which, coincidently, was right at the bottom of the waterfall.

“Blood…I want blood…” the being moaned like a demon. “I WANT ALL YOUR BLOOOOOD!” Suddenly a huge pillar made up of tiny threads of blood shot up from besides the being as he waved his hand. Several undertaker grunts, who were unlucky enough to be in the being’s direct line of sight, suddenly were sucked from where they were standing and pulled right towards the being.

“Blood! Blood! Fresh blood! After all these years! Give me your blood” the being panted excitedly before he flexed his fingers and suddenly the armor of the three soldiers was ripped clean off, revealing the helpless soon to be pale colored skin underneath. The being flexed his fingers in a somewhat taunting manner before suddenly two of the three guards were pulled forward, right into the being’s hands! “Now feed!” Alex being said grimly as he gripped his two, soon to be, victim’s faces and squeezed.

A loud pop was heard as the being crushed the two guard’s heads, with a gentle release the bodies fell into the pool of blood and were immediately drained of any and all bodily fluids leaving nothing but two bloody skeletal forms.

“Tasty, but still thirsty” the being muttered to himself as he looked at the third guard, the guard was scrawny and didn’t have much muscle. The being sighed and tossed the guard aside, sending him clear from the pool of blood that seemed to follow the being wherever he went. The being flexed his fingers as he continued to look around when he suddenly spied the Wretched Egg who was on the very edge of his blood pool. “Oh you look absolutely perfect…” the being muttered to himself as he suddenly submerged inside the pool of blood.

‘Wait where is he going…’ Alex asked himself as he swung far atop the battlefield. It took a moment of looked for Alex to realize where the being was headed. ‘...he’s headed for Wretched Egg!’ Alex quickly leapt from the iron cage and with a loud splash signally that he was now back on the ground. After a tiny bit of recovery time Alex bolted forward just as the being was surfacing.
155211121121111.title: Screaming Madness...

1552111211211111.content:
…

Over with the Wretched Egg, she was in the middle of fighting five armed undertaker grunts. Two of them had guns; the others had Worm Eater knives. She wasn’t really worried; Worm Eater didn’t work on her like it did other deadmen. Her attacks came much too fast and far powerful to be blocked by such a trivial thing. But why she was in danger of being killed when she could have easily killed these fools? Simple, she was having fun with them!

“Come on is that all you’ve got?” the Wretched Egg taunted only enraging the soldiers even more as the two with guns soon opened fire! In a flash of motion the Wretched Egg was forced back, unintentionally touching the pool of blood that had formed mere minutes ago, and simultaneously grabbed from behind.

“Got you…” a voice whispered into the Wretched Egg’s ear when suddenly several mysterious objects were stabbed into the Wretched Egg at various points in her body. One noticeably painful one was her spine which was soon followed by a large spike like object to the back of her head. The Wretched Egg let out visible tears as whatever impaled her now began to fondle her breasts. “…you certainly will do nicely. Nice body, strong muscle tone, short but slim figure. Yes and nice breasts to go along with that.” The voice mocked as he began to move his fingers dangerously close to the Wretch Egg’s nipples when suddenly a loud bone chilling revving pierced the Wretched Egg’s ears. The Wretched Egg tried to move but found her body locked and unresponsive to her commands. With a mighty slash the Wretched Egg was free and quickly jumped out of the pool of blood!

“*pant* Bastard *pant pant* what took you so long” the Wretched Egg gasped as if all her strength had been drained out of her!

“To be frank, SHUT THE HELL UP!” Alex yelled back and quickly delivered a bone shattering kick to the Wretched Egg’s chest, sending her crashing into the wall. The Wretched Egg tried to stand but her legs quickly gave out. “You just stay there and try not to die!” Alex explained as he turned back to face the demon before him.

“So tasty but also such a puppet. Now you on the other hand…” the demon began bearing it’s unholy yellow teeth. “…will you be my puppet or my prey?”

“How’s about this buddy” Alex began, revving his chainsaw again for extra emphasis “you bow before me! Become my demon and we can go fuck the world together! How’s that sound?”

“Destroy the world? Heh well that sounds lovely but first how’s about you become my puppet” the being roared as he dropped into the pool of blood once more. In a sudden jolt of motion a billion tiny red colored threads erupted from the ground and quickly wrapped around Alex. In an attempt to get free Alex used his chainsaw to cut the thread only to find that his chainsaw now with a life of it’s own as it quickly came back and dug into his shoulder.

“AAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHH” Alex screamed as the chainsaw dug into his shoulderblade.

“Hahahahaha pathetic hope you enjoy being slice to pieces” laughed the demon from what seemed like far away! Suddenly the threads around Alex grew even tighter and soon begna to cut into Alex’s skin, much to his growing agony!

“GAH! Get the fuck this shit off me” Alex screamed growing more and more enraged as his own blood began to seep out of his many new wounds.

‘Hmm? What’s this?’ the demon wondered as Alex’s blood began to move and combine together to from what one could only describe as combat tentacles. “No! A human with the ability of a demon! Impossible!” the demon roared as the grip of the thread around Alex grew even tighter only for Alex’s own blood to react in response forming more and more blood tentacles!

“Blood Tentacle: Bloody Mary!” Alex screamed as his blood tentacles suddenly wrapped around the thread. In a flash of motion Alex was freed, covered in his own blood, but freed as his arms and legs continued to bleed out.

“Don’t *pant* underestimate *pant* the power of a Deadman! Especially not one with the power of an Undertaker” Alex gasped as he fell to one knee.

“How interesting…” the demon began as it resurfaced. “…such a power and yet you didn’t have to make a pact with a devil?”

“Well *pant* actually I did make a pact with a devil but that was long after I had these powers. And that devil *pant* is mine to kill! Got that? MINE” Alex roared as he picked up his chainsaw even though it was completely covered in blood and rush forward.

“Ha…” the demon laughed as Alex tried to slash him with the chainsaw only for him to dodge by submerging in the pool of blood and reappearing behind Alex. “…hahaha!”

“Stop laughing at me” Alex screamed as he tried desperately to hit his mark only to somehow miss a second later!

“You cannot hit what you cannot comprehend…” the demon laughed as it flexed its bandaged fingers.

“Oh shit!” Alex gasped just in time for his chainsaw to come to life and try to kill him! Luckily Alex was able to grab the blade before it could be driven into his body that is… at the cost of his fingers! “AGH!” Alex screamed as the bloody chainsaw suddenly slipped from his grasp and nailed him right in the chest!

“Straight for the heart…” the demon whispered into Alex’s ear just before the chainsaw cut into Alex’s ribcage, spattering his blood and part of his lung all across the nearby battlefield. “…soon, yes soon you’ll become my next puppet. Shame you’ll have to lose your heart.”

“Oh fuck no” Alex screamed as he tried to grab the chainsaw once more with his semi-regenerated hands only for the chainsaw to dig even deeper causing a crippling pain to rocket through his entire body. Alex gasped, desperate for air, as his other lung was beginning to fail. “Damn it! I’m not supposed to die yet! Damn it!” Alex gasped as his last lung finally failed just as the chainsaw pierced his heart!

“Heh now you’re my puppet…” the demon laughed as he began to insert what appeared to be a large spike into Alex’s head when suddenly…

“BACK OFF! He’s mine” roared the Wretched Egg as she suddenly came crashing down onto the demon, Hibana’s sword-whip in hand, as a severed arm with matching shoulder falls to the ground.

“AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH” the demon screams as the pool of blood underneath the trio begins to recede and the demon falls to his knees.

“Nobody kills the bastard except me! Got it bandage boy” the Wretched Egg warned as she wrapped the blade around the being in an attempt to bind it.

“…” Alex didn’t have the energy to speak as his body began to regenerate. The Wretched Egg walked over to Alex and gave him a wicked smile as she brutally ripped the chainsaw from Alex’s body, causing an unbearable amount of pain for the regenerating undertaker.

“Oops did that hurt” the Wretched Egg asked in a sarcastic fashion before laughing a devious chuckle.

“Bitch!” Alex screamed/gasped as his lungs fully regenerated.

“Sorry what did you say” the Wretched Egg asked recalling the whole bitch fiasco from earlier today.

“I said…” Alex began taking in as deep a breath as he could manage “…YOU’RE! A! BIT-“ *chainsaw ripping into a certain someone’s chest cavity sound insert here* “…fuck you!”
1552111211211111.title: Bloody Hell...

choices: What else happens while she's asleep?
15521112112111111.content:
“Anyway now that we beat you-“

“I beat him you just finished him off” Alex gasped from his gory spot on the floor a few feet away.

“Pecking order” the Wretched Egg quickly explained shutting up her companion/punching bag…for the moment at least. “Regardless we win, now you’re going to serve me!”

“Heh…” the being began.

“What was that I couldn’t hear you?” the Wretched Egg mocked putting a hand to her ear.

“HA! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA” the being laughed. “Do you even realize what I am? I’m no normal human and yet you think you can control me?”

“Actually…” the Wretched Egg began as she quickly grabbed the being by the throat “…I’m not human either. Not anymore since that crazy bastard turned me into this!”

“Heh, so you got screwed by the devil too” the being chuckled “well at least you got a better deal. I had my skin carved off and my blood became my own prison.”

“Well that explains the whole blood pool thing and the bandage thing too” Alex explains finally taking a place besides his companion/bitch of a leader.

“Hey didn’t you have a chainsaw in your chest” the Wretched Egg asked?

“Yes but I took it out, by the way you owe me a kidney, a lung, and half my RIBCAGE!” Alex growls before the Wretched Egg decked him in the face.

“Hahaha you two have to be the most chaotic duo I’ve ever seen and I’ve seen a Lucifer dress in drag. By the way never let Lucifer ask you if you want to see his special dance. You will never forget it! EVER” the being laughed “By the way the name’s Alex.”

“…” the Wretched Egg and Alex(the undertaker one not the being wrapped in Hibana’s sword)

“What?” Alex the demonic being with more bandages than a hospital patient asked.

“NO WAY IN HELL” the two shouted before decking the demonic hospital boy in the face.

“I’m the only guy aloud to be called Alex here!” Alex exclaimed revving his chainsaw.

“Wait no! Don’t! I NEED AN ADULT!” the demonic wannabe screamed as Alex attacked him with the chainsaw.

…

After about an hour of…stuff, Alex and the Wretched Egg had made an agreement with the humanoid demon formally named Alex.

“Okay from now on you can call me Asura. Okay call me Asura” the demonic being gasped, his teeth having been kicked in, his other arm (the one that wasn’t severed off) having been broken in several places, along with having quite a few, well twenty seven to be honest, broken bones.

“Okay well than since that’s settled what do we do now?” the one and only Alex asked his pure white companion. The Wretched Egg turned to him and was about to speak when suddenly a familiar melody pierced her ears like some sort of angelic hymn. Alex quickly caught the Wretched Egg just seconds before she could face plant into the stone floor.

155221.content:
As usual for my day I awoke from my cell still feeling the pain from my broken arm. "gotta get Genkaku to relax with his guitar." getting dressed I looked around my cell being a undertaker for so long gave me a great many perks I mean hell I got a HDtv ps3 and a bunch of other tech sadly the job I got is so boring Rinichirō doesn't do much besides sit in his room and talk to the twins and shiro. Sigh anyway I grab icorus and walk out of my room only to see the twin walking down the hall with Tamaki. "So shamus how is the old fart." tamaki asked with his usual creepy smile I just keep a straight face and answer. "he's okay Rinichirō dosn't seem to have any problems. Why You planning something?" he only laugh before walking away I frown and look at the twin. "how the hell can you protect that idiot." I asked them and the shrugged and said. "we usually just follow his orders nothing else." and followed tamaki sighing again I walked off to check in with the other undertakers.

Few minutes later.

I had come to the door to the undertaker hide out I alway's thought it should be more hidden but honestly it's not my call. walking in I hear the usual sounds of my higher up boss Genkaku also known as uber monk he could be a normal guy if his perseption on death was so odd but I'm the guy who thinks that burn someone alive is a good way to waist time. Anyway back on topic Genkaku was sitting on his 'throne' playing his bass guitar his usual off hour outfit on I didn't really care though I sat down on the couch as he played waiting for him to take notice of me but he was lost in his own little world I wondered if I should announce my self but he finally stoped. "hey shay howed you like the song?" he asked in his usual fashion I prepared for my usual answer. "it sound like a better version of a mad man life work." he snickered before getting up. "you up for doing your job or the damage I did going to stop ya." "ha like a simple broken arms going to stop me." well this is usually how our quick talks go since nearly every training match we do usually ends with one of us bandaged ever since we both came here.

Flash back.

It started a few years ago I was sentence for trying to find truth behind the great quake but the rebuilding of the cities got in my way so I just burnt them down one at a time saddly I got caught after my 18 building two hundred people burned to death at a party dedicated to the reconstruction of some building. Anyway I had met Genkaku not to long after he was still the leader of the undertakers after getting into a few fights they sent him after me and as they say we really hit it off he hired me as an undertaker tamaki was angry that he wasn't informed but he sucked it up and then I learned a few of the secrets of DMWL like the deadmen, the branches of sin, and other things but as I said I don't care though I built icorus I seem to be the only undertaker who refuses to put a worm eater into my weapon I just don't really trust the inventor but ehh.

End of flash back.

After a few minutes of talking of random shit I got up to leave for my 'job' but Genkaku stopped me. "dude I got a bit of a different job for ya." at that moment a little girl walked in I was a little weirded out that a child had gotten this low in wonderland did she get lost? She walked up and bowed. "hello sir I'm Hibana Daida I will be working with you." at that point my eye grew a child a fucking child I don't work with fucking kids no nater what I was about to flip shit at Genkaku for this when he informed me about her. "she was arrested murdering her kindergarten class 3 years ago the medical teams and research group have altered her she not normal to say the least." great more fucking mass produced monsters how the hell could this go wrong ugh. "so what do you want me to do with her." I asked annoyed Genkaku smiled before telling me I was to show her around atleast I could get something to do besides sit with so old bag of bone we left and I showed her the none restricted areas (or more truthfully the one that normal prisoner are alowed to see.) and then we head to the restricted G-block was boring as ever I don't really mess with these branch of sin freaks except for owl but I only talk to him when need then we ran into the one basterd I hate more then tamaki it was "Rukuro Bundō what's a low life like you want?" he ignored me and looked at the girl. "Hibana you have to come with me for your 'weapon'." (forgot to mention where out of G-block so other deadman don't hear.) the Hibana left and I head twords my other job when I reached Richirō's room he was talking to shiro again who just smiled and waved I did the same and sat down trying to hold off the urge to sleep sadly it won I awoke to...

As the alarm sounds Richirō moves his wheel chair to his desk to see what it was I followed now noticing shiro left while seeing the computer moniter it showed a few men fighting one another from the look of the room the fight was happening in G-block so it was probably some deadman you also notice a few dead undertaker gaurds sighing you grab icorus. I said with a wicked smile I the detached the blade of icorus and activated the flame thrower heating the blade till it actually looked red then I pressed it against the injury he screamed louder than before I did the same to both legs he passed out from the pain I only smiled and hauled his body to the medics office only to bump into Rei Takashima who looked like she won the lottery I left before she could start talking to me I never really liked her but crazy bitches need to keep their distance but you can't avoid everything I was about to pick something for lunch when makina and her assistant Kasuga Kyōko she looked at makina looked pissed while Kasuga was nervous as ever I just tryed to ignore them and go on with my lunch break it was a quick moment but we've had our problems since I came here mostly being blamed for a few fires here and there I prefer bodies not objects anyway I headed to the mitch's bar and yet again ran into a familiar face mockingbird. "you mind telling me about earlier?" he only smiled and ate when I was going to ask again he ran I would have chased but I didn't care I ate and the rest of the day was boring I did run into Daida again but only for a second I head to my cell only to find a notice to be in a fight in carnival corpse I didn't care since well i didn't care.

Tomorrow.
1552212.title: A test of strength.

15522121.content:
Shamus head for the corpse carnival arena he entered to only see Genkaku and Daida standing in the center instantly he smiled. "so we are showing the newbi the ropes okay man." shamus said pulling out icorus and pointing it at Genkaku who shook his head. "no you remember what you had to do on your first day as a undertaker?" shamus tryed to remember and it hit him since he was 'special' he had to fight Genkaku to gain his 'placement'. "you explain the rules to her." shamus said only to see Genkaku face palm. "damn it totally slipped since we haven't done this in so long." he was right a 'special' undertaker didn't come along in a while so it was rare to have these fights. "okay the rules are simple this is kind of a ranking fight nothing truly at up for grabs except only your placement on a certain leader board." Genkaku finished but Daida raised her had. " what's with this leader board?" she asked shamus answered. "you see there is a hierarchy here Genkaku is at the top as our official slash unofficial leader I'm second on it so if I where to say win a match against him I'd take his spot on the leader board and be the unofficial leader of the undertakers. Do you understand?" shamus said only to get Daida to raise her hand again. "but if his job is still leader how are you the leader also how aren't any of the other undertaker not on the leader board?" she asked shamus chuckled. "that's easy if you notice me, you, Genkaku, and Mr broken joystick are different we don't wear the undertaker armor and we have our own weapon rather then rifles and knives we are special ether by our crimes or personallities while. Now the leader board thing is if Genkaku acts like a figurehead basicly just accepting orders or telling me the jobs while I dish them out to different undertakers so if that's everything let's begin." shamus says warming up icorus's flame Daida drops her dog backpack pulling out her giant whip blade and the two swing taking and blocking each others attacks saddly shamus is doing more blocking then attacking that is until Diada's sword crashes into the tank on icorus causing a explosion in gulfing shamus in flames Daida smiles thinking she's won until laughter could be heard. "he he he ha ha ha HA HA HA HAHAHAHAHA!!!" in the flames stands shamus his right arm completely on fire and icorus's blade wedged into his sholder. "Oh god I've forgotten how good the smell of burnt flesh is the escence of the hair, bone, and flesh melting into a slury of greatness." with that he grabed what remained of icorus's out of his arm and held it to his arm making sure the flame caught the blade and charged at Diada a smile painted on his face as he slashed at her hand make sure to slice fast enough to cut deep she was forced to drop he sword he then grabbed her and held her to the ground lifting it up to end her when a memory flashed before his eyes.

-----flash back-----

It was his home his wife was sitting next to some one he could not tell who but then it happen the great quake that had destroyed japan he found him self under a pile of ruble but escaped to see his house on fire and his wife pinned down under burning beams and the guest standing above her head his wife screamed for help only to be shot with a revolver round to the for head the guest turned and left him only with a smile he cryed over his wife corpse only to leave and start his search for the truth.

-----reality sort of.-----

A punch from Genkaku stamped him out of what he was doing he was about to kill Daida even though it was against the rules to do so he also felt the pain of the burns he blacked out.
